22a2(brgyad stong): grangs med pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su mya ngan las bzlas/ gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nges par mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi sa la bzhugs te
22a3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes des 'di ltar yang gnas par mi bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
22a4(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das pa dang nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ gzhal du med grangs
22a5(brgyad stong): med pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su mya ngan las bzlas/ gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nges par mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi sa la
22a6(brgyad stong): b zhugs te sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes des 'di ltar yang gnas par mi bya na des yang ci ltar
22a7(brgyad stong): 'di la gnas par bya ci ltar bslab par bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
22a8(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci zhig la gnas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
22b1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas ni ci la yang gnas pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni shin du mi gnas pa ste de ni 'dus byas kyi khams la yang mi gnas la 'dus ma byas kyi khams
22b2(brgyad stong): la yang mi gnas te de las bzhengs pa yang ma yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di lta bu nyid gnas
22b3(brgyad stong): par bya zhing 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ga' zhig la gnas pa ma yin zhing mi gnas pa yang ma yin la mi mthun par gnas pa ma yin zhing mi mthun par mi gnas
22b4(brgyad stong): pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ci lta ba de bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam zhing de bzhin du bslab par bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ci lta ba de bzhin du gnas na
22b5(brgyad stong): mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis shes par gnas pa yin no snyam du 'dis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar gnas par bya zhing de bzhin du bslab par bya ste/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
22b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas shing yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral ba yin no/ /de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi skad
22b7(brgyad stong): dang gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang gnod sbyin gyi tshig dang gnod sbyin gyi gtam du byas pa dang gnod sbyin gyi rab tu brjod pa gang yin pa de dag smras pa ni shes par rung gi/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gang 'chad pa dang rab tu brjod pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston
22b8(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni shes par yang mi rung ngo snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid de lta bu sems kyis yongs su shes nas lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag shes
23a1(brgyad stong): par mi rung shes par mi rung zhes bya ba de ni 'di ltar 'di la cung zad kyang smos pa med de/ 'di la cung zad kyang thos pa med do/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag yang 'di snyam sems par gyur te/ e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor 'dis ni gsal
23a2(brgyad stong): bar byed par 'gyur ro e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor 'dis ni gsal bar byed par 'gyur te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor ni ring ba bas kyang ches ring du 'jug pa 'phags pa rab 'byor ni phra ba bas kyang ches phra ba zab pa bas kyang ches zab par
23a3(brgyad stong): 'jug pas ston cing 'chad do snyam mo/ /de nas yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu dag de lta bas na
23a4(brgyad stong): gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma rten par mi 'grub bo/ /de bzhin du sbyar te gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang
23a5(brgyad stong): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'dod pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas
23a6(brgyad stong): par 'dod pa dang / gang rang byang chub thob par 'dod pa dang rang byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma rten par mi 'grub bo/ /gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
23a7(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma rten par mi 'grub bo/ /de nas yang lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di la chos nyan pa rang bzhin ci lta bu zhig btsal bar bya snyam pa dang / de nas
23a8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag kho bo la chos nyan pa ni sgyu ma dang sprul pa lta bu dag btsal bar bya'o/ /
23b1(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de dag ni nyan par mi 'gyur mngon du byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa rab 'byor yang ci sems can de dag sgyu ma lta bu yin
23b2(brgyad stong): gyi de dag sgyu ma ni ma yin nam/ de skad ces smras pa dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu dag sems can de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu lha'i bu dag sems can de dag ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ lha'i bu dag
23b3(brgyad stong): de ltar na sgyu ma dang sems can dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /de ltar na rmi lam dang sems can dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /lha'i bu dag chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa yang
23b4(brgyad stong): sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o/ /de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa yang sgyu ma lta
23b5(brgyad stong): bu rmi lam lta bu'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o/ /rang sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi
23b6(brgyad stong): lam lta bu'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa rab 'byor yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang
23b7(brgyad stong): sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o/ /zhes zer ram yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bur smra na chos
23b8(brgyad stong): gzhan lta ci smos/ lha'i bu de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag bdag ni gal te mya ngan las
24a1(brgyad stong): 'das pa las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos gzhan zhig yod kyang de yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes smra'o/ /lha'i bu dag de ltar na sgyu ma dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /de ltar na
24a2(brgyad stong): rmi lam dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu dang tshe dang ldan pa lto rings chen po dang tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po dang tshe dang ldan pa 'od
24a3(brgyad stong): srung chen po dang nyan thos chen po gzhan dag gis byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma dang thabs gcig du tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar bstan
24a4(brgyad stong): pa 'di la su dag yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas brtan de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sam/ lta ba phun sum
24a5(brgyad stong): tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams sam/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa gang yin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gnas brtan de dag la 'di
24a6(brgyad stong): skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa su yang mi 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma smos chos gang yang yongs su snang bar ma
24a7(brgyad stong): byas/ chos gang yang ma bzhag go/ /de bas na ci ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma smos chos gang yang yongs su snang bar ma byas chos gang yang ma bzhag pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la yang dag par
24a8(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa gang yang mi 'byung ngo / /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis de ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa la bdag gis kyang mchod pa'i don du 'di ltar me tog dag mngon par sprul
24b1(brgyad stong): te 'phags pa rab 'byor la mngon par gtor to snyam mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i tshe me tog dag mngon par sprul nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la mngon par gtor to/ /de nas gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lha rnams
24b2(brgyad stong): kyi dbang po brgya byin la rjes su brjod pa'i phyir 'di snyam du sems te/ yang 'di ltar lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gis sngon chad sum bcu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas na yang yod par ma
24b3(brgyad stong): mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o/ /'di ltar lha rnams kyi dbang pos mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni shing dang gel ba dang 'khri shing las skyes pa ma yin gyi yid las byung ba'i me tog go snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi
24b4(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid las skyes
24b5(brgyad stong): pa'i me tog ni gang yang med de shing dang gel ba dang 'khri shing las skyes pa yang ma yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka gang khyod 'di skad du me tog 'di dag ni ma
24b6(brgyad stong): skyes pa ste/ me tog 'di dag ni yid las skyes pa ma yin shing dang gel ba dang 'khri shing las skyes pa yang ma yin no zhes zer na/ kau shi ka gang ma skyes pa de ni me tog ma yin no/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems
24b7(brgyad stong): te/ e ma 'o 'phags pa rab 'byor ni shes rab zab ste ming dang tshig du btags pa de yang ston la de dang yang 'gal bar yang mi byed/ de nyid kyang gsal bar byed cing de nyid kyang nye bar ston to snyam mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
24b8(brgyad stong): gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te 'phags pa rab 'byor ci skad du nye bar ston pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di la bslab
25a1(brgyad stong): par bya'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di la bslab par bya'o/ /
25a2(brgyad stong): kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi slob bo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi slob phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi slob dgra bcom pa nyid la mi slob bo/ /rang sangs rgyas nyid
25a3(brgyad stong): la mi slob sangs rgyas nyid la mi slob ste/ gang sa 'di dag la mi slob pa de ni sangs rgyas nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo/ /gang sangs rgyas nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med
25a4(brgyad stong): grangs med pa la slob bo/ /gang sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med grangs med pa la slob pa de ni gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /de bzhin du de tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma
25a5(brgyad stong): yin de rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /gang gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa dang gang tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin gang rnam par
25a6(brgyad stong): shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de na gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /de bzhin du de tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin de rnam par shes pa yongs
25a7(brgyad stong): su gzung ba dang dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir yang mi slob ste/ skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob bo/ /gang chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi
25a8(brgyad stong): slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob ste/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
25b1(brgyad stong): la slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos 'ga'
25b2(brgyad stong): zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob/ nub pa'i phyir mi slob na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
25b3(brgyad stong): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de
25b4(brgyad stong): b zhin no de de bzhin te tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su
25b5(brgyad stong): gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
25b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa
25b7(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang las btsal bar bya/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshe dang
25b8(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi
26a1(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di su'i mthur rig par bya 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chad pa
26a2(brgyad stong): gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur rig par bya/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka
26a3(brgyad stong): g ang 'di skad du 'phags pa rab 'byor gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di su'i mthur rig par bya 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya zhes zer ba ni kau shi ka bdag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chad pa gang
26a4(brgyad stong): yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur rig par bya'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya'o/ /kau shi ka gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
26a5(brgyad stong): du phyin pa gang las btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/ /kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gzugs las btsal bar mi bya gzugs las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /
26a6(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba las ma yin 'du shes las ma yin 'du byed rnams las ma yin rnam par shes pa las btsal bar mi bya rnam pa shes pa las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs
26a7(brgyad stong): ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs las gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin 'du shes ma yin 'du byed rnams ma yin rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
26a8(brgyad stong): pa ma yin rnam par shes pa las gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta
26b1(brgyad stong): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o/ /'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
26b2(brgyad stong): 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa de de bzhin no kau shi ka de de bzhin te kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab
26b3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /
26b4(brgyad stong): kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs che ba'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang
26b5(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa che ba'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o/ /gzugs tshad ma med pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma
26b6(brgyad stong): med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa tshad ma med pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir
26b7(brgyad stong): kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni
26b8(brgyad stong): tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa
27a1(brgyad stong): mtha' yas pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du pha rol du phyin pa chen po zhes bya bar mngon par chags par mi byed de/ de bzhin du tshad ma med
27a2(brgyad stong): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o zhes mngon par chags par mi byed do/ /kau shi ka de lta bas na 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol
27a3(brgyad stong): du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o/ /'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste
27a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka yang ci ltar na
27a5(brgyad stong): dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yin zhe na/ /kau shi ka 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma mi dmigs te de bas na kau shi ka
27a6(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ste/ kau shi ka rnam grangs 'dis dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol
27a7(brgyad stong): du phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang gang gi phyir 'di ltar chos thams cad mtha' yas mu med de de rnams kyi thog ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigs te/ de bas na kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
27a8(brgyad stong): 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhen/ kau shi ka gzugs kyi thog ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes
27b1(brgyad stong): pa'i thog ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigs te/ kau shi ka rnam grangs 'dis kyang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka
27b2(brgyad stong): gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas mu med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can la thog ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka de bas na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol
27b3(brgyad stong): du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa rab 'byor ji ltar na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste
27b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yin/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka bgrang ba dang mi ldan pa 'am bgrang ba mang pos sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab
27b5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di/ mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yin no/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'o na ci ltar sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha'
27b6(brgyad stong): yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems 'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags
27b7(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin chos med pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin te ming du btags pa 'di ni glo bur du byung ba'o/ /ming du btags pa 'di ni dngos po med
27b8(brgyad stong): pa'o/ /ming du btags pa 'di ni bdag gi ba med pa'o/ /'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes ming du btags pa 'di ni dmigs su med pa'o/ /gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems 'di la
28a1(brgyad stong): sems can du yongs su brtan par byas pa gang yang yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gang la sems can yongs su bstan par byas pa
28a2(brgyad stong): 'ga' zhig med pa de la sems can mtha' yas pa yod dam/ kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang bzhugs te mtha' las 'das pa
28a3(brgyad stong): r nam par rig par byed pa'i dbyangs dang gsung dbyangs zab mos sems can sems can zhes tshig tu brjod du zin kyang de la sems can gang yang skyes pa 'am skye bar 'gyur ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am 'gag par 'gyur pa 'am 'gag pa yod
28a4(brgyad stong): dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas dag pa'i phyir dang thog ma nas yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar
28a5(brgyad stong): sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka de ltar yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /
28a6(brgyad stong): de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa dang drang srong dang bcas pa dang skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams kyis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ e ma'o chos
28a7(brgyad stong): e ma'o chos e ma'o chos rnams kyi chos nyid de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis legs par smras pas brjod cing bstan te bshad la rab tu gzhag go/ /bcom ldan 'das deng slan cad bdag
28a8(brgyad stong): cag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
28b1(brgyad stong): pa lags par 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa dang drang srong dang bcas pa dang skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs de rnams la bka' stsal pa/
28b2(brgyad stong): lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no de de bzhin te lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na mar me can zhes bya ba'i tshong dus kyi dbus su mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung na
28b3(brgyad stong): nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral bar gyur pas/ de'i tshe mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i 'dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa
28b4(brgyad stong): n a shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten rig pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi
28b5(brgyad stong): ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
28b6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub par byed pa dang rjes su yongs su 'dzin par byed pa ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar to zhes gsol to/ /
28b7(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las brgya byin gyi le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po gsum pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
28b8(brgyad stong): 'khor der lha'i bu gang dag 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa dang dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gang dag 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa dang / lha'i bu de rnams 'dus te 'khod par gyur par mkhyen cing 'khor bzhi
29a1(brgyad stong): po thams cad 'dus shing 'khod par yang mkhyen nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang 'od gsal dang dge chung dang 'og min gyi lha'i bu rnams dbang du
29a2(brgyad stong): gzhag ste/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu
29a3(brgyad stong): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam 'chang ngam klog gam kun chub par byed dam rab tu 'don na/ de la bdud dam bdud kyi rigs kyi lha glags lta ba dang glags tshol bdag gis glags rnyed par mi
29a4(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa glags lta ba dang glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus
29a5(brgyad stong): byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu dag gzhan yang lha'i bu gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang lha'i bu gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma bzung ba dang ma bcangs
29a6(brgyad stong): pa dang ma klags pa dang kun chub par ma byas pa dang rab tu mi 'don pa'i lha'i bu de dag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du 'ong bar 'dod par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang
29a7(brgyad stong): kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa de la nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur 'chang bar 'gyur klog par 'gyur kun chub par byed par 'gyur rab tu 'don par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu dag gzhan yang rigs kyi
29a8(brgyad stong): b u 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa de dgon par song yang rung shing drung du song yang rung khyim stong du song yang rung bla gab med
29b1(brgyad stong): par song yang rung lam du song yang rung lam gol bar song yang rung 'brog dgon par song yang rung rgya mtsho chen por song yang rung / de dang der 'gro ba 'am 'chag pa 'am 'dug pa 'am nyal ba na yang rung ste/ 'jigs par
29b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba'am rengs par 'gyur ba nyid mi 'byung mi skye'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
29b3(brgyad stong): 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de ni theg pa gsum gyis sems can rnams 'dul bar bgyid cing sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi skyed pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das
29b4(brgyad stong): bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o/ /de nas
29b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog
29b6(brgyad stong): pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de dag la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pas kyang 'di skad ces gsol
29b7(brgyad stong): to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang
29b8(brgyad stong): bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin
30a1(brgyad stong): pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag nges par 'thob cing yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das yang ci shes rab kyi
30a2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung na pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ram/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka de de bzhin no/ /
30a3(brgyad stong): de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bzung bas pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub
30a4(brgyad stong): par byed pa dang rab tu 'don par byed na kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di la yon tan gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba de thams cad legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan
30a5(brgyad stong): 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis legs so zhes gsol nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka de la gang zhig
30a6(brgyad stong): chos 'di la rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed 'dod na/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gi rtsod pa dang rgol ba dang 'gal bar byed pa skyes shing skyes pa rnams slar nub pa
30a7(brgyad stong): nyid du 'gyur zhing gnas par mi 'gyur te/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'gyur
30a8(brgyad stong): te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du byed pa de'i rtsod pa'i
30b1(brgyad stong): gzhi de ltar skyes shing skyes pa de dag slar yang nub pa nyid du 'gyur zhing gnas par mi 'gyur te/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka
30b2(brgyad stong): r igs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du byed pa de tshe 'di la yon
30b3(brgyad stong): tan 'di dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na rtsi ma g+hi zhes bya ba dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhig yod de der skye bo sbrul gdug pa bkres shing zas 'dod de zas tshol ba zhig gis srog chags
30b4(brgyad stong): s u gyur pa 'ga' zhig mthong ste skye bo sbrul gdug pa des zas kyi phyir bza' bar 'dod nas srog chags su gyur pa de'i dri'i phyogs su 'brang zhing bsnyags pa dang de nas srog chags su gyur pa de rtsi ma g+hi gang na yod pa der song nas
30b5(brgyad stong): phyin te 'dug pa dang de nas sbrul de rtsi de'i dri tsam gyis phyir ldog go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sbrul gyi gdug pa zil gyis gnon pa de ni rtsi de'i sman gyi yon tan du blta bar bya ste rtsi de ni de ltar mthu che'o/ /kau shi ka de
30b6(brgyad stong): b zhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa de la ni kau shi ka
30b7(brgyad stong): r tsod pa dang rgol ba dang 'gal bar byed pa'i gzhi skyes shing skyes pa gang yin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzi brjid dang stobs dang mthu dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas myur du de nyid nas med par
30b8(brgyad stong): 'gyur nye bar zhi zhing 'phel bar mi 'gyur te de gang dag gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid nas 'gag cing nub par 'gyur la gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyin zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa nas
31a1(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'das pa nyid kyi bar du 'dzin pa dag nye bar zhi bar byed de rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no/ /kau shi ka rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
31a2(brgyad stong): pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang
31a3(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du byed pa de la srung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar byed de des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am
31a4(brgyad stong): r igs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du byed pa de'i tshig gzung bar 'os
31a5(brgyad stong): par 'gyur tshig 'jam par 'gyur tshig ran par 'gyur tshig 'chal ba med par 'gyur ro/ /khro bas zil gyis non par mi 'gyur nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar
31a6(brgyad stong): s hes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su dul bar byed shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su 'dud par byed de khro ba 'phel bar mi byed nga rgyal 'phel bar mi byed khon du 'dzin pa yongs su mi 'chang gnod sems yongs su
31a7(brgyad stong): mi 'chang la bag la nyal ba mi 'dzin to/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar spyod pa de la dran pa dang byams pa skye bar 'gyur zhing / de 'di snyam du sems te gal te bdag gis gnod sems bskyed du zin na
31a8(brgyad stong): b dag gi dbang po rnams 'khrugs shing bzhin gyi mdog kyang 'gyur bas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs zhing 'di la slob par 'dod pa khro ba'i dbang du 'gro ba 'di ni mi rigs
31b1(brgyad stong): so snyam nas de myur du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye
31b2(brgyad stong): bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis
31b3(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su dul ba dang khengs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ngo mtshar
31b4(brgyad stong): to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur 'chang bar 'gyur klog par 'gyur kun chub par byed par
31b5(brgyad stong): 'gyur rab tu 'don par 'gyur ston par 'gyur nye bar ston par 'gyur lung 'bogs par 'gyur kha ton byed par 'gyur zhing / gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin
31b6(brgyad stong): pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pas g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe g.yul du thog mar zhugs par gyur na de g.yul du
31b7(brgyad stong): 'jug gam g.yul du zhugs sam g.yul las 'das sam g.yul kyi nang du 'gro 'am 'greng ngam 'dug kyang rung ste/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
31b8(brgyad stong): ' di yid la 'dzin pa 'am 'chang ba 'am klog pa 'am kun chub par byed pa 'am rab tu 'don pa 'am ston pa 'am nye bar ston pa 'am lung 'bogs pa 'am kha ton byed pa de srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba gang yin pa
32a1(brgyad stong): 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/ /gzhan gyi gnod pa byed pas de srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba 'di yang gnas ma yin no/ /kau shi ka yang gal te 'ga' zhig gis de la dbyug pa 'am mtshon nam bong ba 'am
32a2(brgyad stong): gzhan gang yang rung bas 'phangs na de'i lus la phog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma
32a3(brgyad stong): med pa'i rig sngags so/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i rig sngags so/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rig sngags so/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab
32a4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa med pa'i rig sngags so/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka rig sngags 'di la slob pa'i
32a5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ni bdag la gnod pa bya bar yang mi sems gzhan la gnod pa bya bar yang mi sems gnyi ga la gnod pa bya bar yang mi sems so/ /kau shi ka rig sngags 'di la slob ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
32a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
32a7(brgyad stong): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka rig sngags 'di la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gang ma thob pa 'am ma
32a8(brgyad stong): shes pa 'am mngon sum du ma byas pa gang yang med de/ /de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o/ /kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang
32b1(brgyad stong): klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di yang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang gang du shes rab kyi pha
32b2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di chung ngu na bris te glegs bam du chud par byas shing mchod pa sngon du byas te gzhag nas bkur stir byed la/ mi 'dzin mi 'chang mi klog kun chub par mi byed rab tu 'don par mi byed ston par mi byed nye bar ston par
32b3(brgyad stong): mi byed lung 'bogs par mi byed kha ton mi byed pa der yang / kau shi ka sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par sems can rnams la mi dang mi ma yin pa glags lta ba dag gis glags bltas kyang glags
32b4(brgyad stong): rnyed par mi 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/ /kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na gang dag byang chub kyi snying
32b5(brgyad stong): p o na 'dug pa dang byang chub kyi snying po'i khor yug na 'dug pa dang byang chub kyi snying po'i nang na 'dug pa dang byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba na 'dug pa'i mi dang mi ma yin pa dang byol song yan chad kyang sngon gyi las kyi rnam par
32b6(brgyad stong): smin pa ma gtogs par mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis gtse ba 'am gnod par bya ba 'am 'bebs par byed mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhen/ gang dag sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa dang khon med pa dang
32b7(brgyad stong): m i skrag pa rab tu sgom par mdzad cing rab tu ston par mdzad pa 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams der mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
32b8(brgyad stong): pa dang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du kau shi ka gang du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'dzin pa dang
33a1(brgyad stong): ' chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du byed pa der kau shi ka sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par sems can mi dang mi ma
33a2(brgyad stong): yin pa dag gis gtse ba 'am gnod par bya ba 'am 'bebs bar byed mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhen/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid kyis sa phyogs de sems can rnams kyi mchod rten du gyur par byas pa dang
33a3(brgyad stong): phyag bya ba dang rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang ri mor bya ba dang bsnyen bkur du bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang der nye bar phyin pa'i sems can rnams kyi skyob pa dang skyabs dang gnas dang dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar
33a4(brgyad stong): byas pas so/ /kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di la phan yon 'di dag kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol
33a5(brgyad stong): to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris nas glegs bam du chud par bgyis te bzhag la/ de la lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba
33a6(brgyad stong): d ang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bgyis
33a7(brgyad stong): pa dang bla mar bgyis pa dang rjed pa dang mchod pa dang ri mor bgyis pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
33a8(brgyad stong): s ku dag mchod rten gyi nang du stsal te yongs su 'dzin cing 'chang la de dag la yang de bzhin du lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i
33b1(brgyad stong): r gyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bgyis pa dang bla mar bgyis pa dang rjed pa dang mchod pa dang ri mor bgyis pa dang bsnyen bkur
33b2(brgyad stong): bgyis na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gnyis gang bsod nams ches mang du skyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
33b3(brgyad stong): kau shi ka de'i phyir 'di khyod nyid la dri bar bya ste khyod kyis ci ltar nus pa de bzhin du lung ston cig /kau shi ka 'di ci snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thams
33b4(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bdag gi dngos po mngon par grub pa gang yin pa des lam gang zhig la bslabs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
33b5(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
33b6(brgyad stong): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
33b7(brgyad stong): dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de lta bas na 'o na ni bdag gi dngos po'i sku 'di brnyes pas de bzhin gshegs
33b8(brgyad stong): pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi 'gro'i/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /kau shi ka de bzhin
34a1(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las byung ba yin zhing / kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs
34a2(brgyad stong): pa'i bdag gi dngos po'i sku brnyes pa 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa las byung ba yin te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rten du gyur pa yin no/ /rten 'di la rten nas ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i
34a3(brgyad stong): ye shes rab tu 'byed par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu 'byed par yang 'gyur/ chos kyi sku rab tu 'byed par yang 'gyur/ dge 'dun gyi sku rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa'i
34a4(brgyad stong): ye shes kyi rgyu bdag gi dngos po'i sku brnyes pa gang yin pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rten du gyur pas na/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur cing phyag bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang rjed par bya ba
34a5(brgyad stong): dang / mchod pa bya ba dang ri mor bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya bar gyur pa yin la/ de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang sku de dag la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
34a6(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas glegs bam du chud par byas te bzhag la/ de la lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i
34a7(brgyad stong): gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed
34a8(brgyad stong): ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la
34b1(brgyad stong): mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba na glegs bam du chud pa 'di la bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed mchod pa
34b2(brgyad stong): rnam pa mang po dag byed na 'di nyid de las bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byed pa des thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /
34b3(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i mi gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri bar mi bgyid 'dzin
34b4(brgyad stong): p ar mi bgyid 'chang bar mi bgyid klog par mi bgyid kun chub par mi bgyid rab tu 'don par mi bgyid ston par mi bgyid nye bar ston par mi bgyid lung 'bogs par mi bgyid kha ton du mi bgyid shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la
34b5(brgyad stong): me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par mi bgyid de/ bkur
34b6(brgyad stong): stir mi bgyid bla mar mi bgyid rjed par mi bgyid mchod par mi bgyid ri mor mi bgyid bsnyen bkur mi bgyid pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das ci bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyis
34b7(brgyad stong): pa de ltar don chen po can du ma 'tshal lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das ci bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bgyis pa de ltar phan yon chen po dang ldan par rtogs par ma gyur
34b8(brgyad stong): lags sam/ de ltar 'bras bu che ba dang rnam par smin pa che bar des rig par ma gyur lags sam/ 'on te 'tshal cing rtogs la rig kyang slar zhing dad par ma gyur pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das
35a1(brgyad stong): kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka 'di ci snyam du sems 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang gang dag chos la
35a2(brgyad stong): rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang gang dag dge 'dun la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa ci snyed cig yod/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
35a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang gang dag chos la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang gang dag dge 'dun la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa ni nyung ngo / /
35a4(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs
35a5(brgyad stong): nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang gang dag chos la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang gang dag dge 'dun la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo / /kau shi ka gang dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni nyung ba de dag bas kyang
35a6(brgyad stong): ches nyung ngo / /gang dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'od ba'i 'bras bu thob pa ni nyung ba de dag bas kyang ches nyung ngo / /gang dag dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa ni nyung ba de dag bas kyang ches nyung ngo / /gang dag rang
35a7(brgyad stong): byang chub mngon du byed pa ni nyung ba de dag bas kyang ches nyung ngo / /gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni nyung ba de dag bas kyang ches nyung ngo / /gang dag bla na med pa yang dag
35a8(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sems bskyed pa de rab tu rgyas par byed pa de ni nyung ba de dag bas kyang ches nyung ngo / /gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de
35b1(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa rgyas par byas nas brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo / /gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo / /
35b2(brgyad stong): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo / /gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'bad de phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ni nyung ba de dag
35b3(brgyad stong): bas kyang ches nyung ngo / /gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'bad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo / /
35b4(brgyad stong): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'bad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo / /kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa'
35b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gang dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo lhag
35b6(brgyad stong): pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing 'bad pa gzhan rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar ston cing lung 'bogs pa dang de dag la yang 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / 'chang du 'jug pa dang /
35b7(brgyad stong): klog tu 'jug pa dang kun chub par byed pa 'jug pa dang rab tu 'don du 'jug pa dang ston du 'jug pa dang nye bar ston du 'jug pa dang lung 'bogs su 'jug pa dang kha ton byed du 'jug pa de dang /
35b8(brgyad stong): de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu
36a1(brgyad stong): dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dang dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed pa
36a2(brgyad stong): dag yin no/ /kau shi ka yang gang dag byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems rgyas par byed cing byang chub kyi sems rab du rgyas par byas te byang chub du spyod pa'i sems can dag ni
36a3(brgyad stong): gzhal du med pa grangs med par yod mod kyi/ kau shi ka yang sems can gzhal du med pa grangs med pa byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa de dag las gal te na gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
36a4(brgyad stong): sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni brtson 'grus zhan pa dang le lo can dang sems pa dman pa dang sems dman pa dang 'du shes dman pa dang mos pa
36a5(brgyad stong): dman pa dang shes rab dman pa rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/ /kau shi ka de bas na de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang myur du bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
36a6(brgyad stong): ' dod pas rgyun mi 'chad par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya'o gzung bar bya'o bcang bar bya'o klag par bya'o kun chub par bya'o rab du 'don par bya'o bstan par bya'o nye bar bstan par bya'o lung 'bog
36a7(brgyad stong): par bya'o kha ton du bya'o yongs su dri bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sngon byang chub
36a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la bslabs pas/ bdag cag gis kyang 'di la bslab par bya ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi ston pa'o zhes shes te/ kau shi ka
36b1(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs kyang rung yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
36b2(brgyad stong): nyid la brten par bya'o/ /kau shi ka de bas na de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mchod
36b3(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can bye ba du ma byed du bcug ste/ byas nas kyang des de la nam 'tsho ba'i bar du lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang
36b4(brgyad stong): l ha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug du lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis
36b5(brgyad stong): mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ ci rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/
36b6(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/
36b7(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub du sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu
36b8(brgyad stong): 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ci lta bur grub pa'i
37a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul
37a2(brgyad stong): d ang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngam bzhag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la me tog dang
37a3(brgyad stong): bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang khor yug du mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed
37a4(brgyad stong): bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams kyi phung po mang du bskyed do/ /kau shi ka rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin
37a5(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can bye ba du ma lta zhog / kau shi ka yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling 'di kun du rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs
37a6(brgyad stong): pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyis yongs su gang bar byed du bcug ste/ byas nas kyang de dag la nam 'tsho ba'i bar du lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na
37a7(brgyad stong): b za' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug du lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par
37a8(brgyad stong): byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems ci rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
37b1(brgyad stong): mang ngo bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dis bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de
37b2(brgyad stong): rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub du sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs
37b3(brgyad stong): pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang 'di'i don rnam par 'grel ba dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
37b4(brgyad stong): tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub
37b5(brgyad stong): p a byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngam bzhag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
37b6(brgyad stong): dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang khor yug du mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
37b7(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/ /kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin kyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba lta zhog /kau
37b8(brgyad stong): s hi ka yang gal te gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad las sems can re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi
38a1(brgyad stong): snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho ba'i bar du lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal
38a2(brgyad stong): mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug du lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed
38a3(brgyad stong): na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ ci sems can de dag thams cad de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / bcom ldan 'das
38a4(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dis bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub du sems
38a5(brgyad stong): bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher
38a6(brgyad stong): yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i
38a7(brgyad stong): chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs
38a8(brgyad stong): bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngam bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang khor yug tu mar me'i
38b1(brgyad stong): phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de'i gzhi
38b2(brgyad stong): las bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do/ /kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog /kau shi ka yang stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed yod
38b3(brgyad stong): pa de dag thams cad las sems can re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho ba'i bar du lha'i me tog dang
38b4(brgyad stong): l ha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug du lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang
38b5(brgyad stong): lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de bkur stir byed bla mar byed/ rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems ci sems can de dag thams cad de'i gzhi las bsod nams
38b6(brgyad stong): mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di ches bsod nams mang du
38b7(brgyad stong): skyed do/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu
38b8(brgyad stong): ' don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed
39a1(brgyad stong): pa dang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan
39a2(brgyad stong): g dags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngam bzhag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
39a3(brgyad stong): dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang khor yug du mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka rigs
39a4(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de'i gzhi las bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ /kau shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog /kau shi ka yang stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
39a5(brgyad stong): sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad las sems can re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho ba'i bar du
39a6(brgyad stong): l ha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng
39a7(brgyad stong): ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems ci sems can de dag
39a8(brgyad stong): thams cad de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang
39b1(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dis bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas lhag pa'i bsam
39b2(brgyad stong): p as nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang
39b3(brgyad stong): 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur
39b4(brgyad stong): cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par
39b5(brgyad stong): byas te 'chang ngam bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang khor yug tu mar me'i
39b6(brgyad stong): phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de'i gzhi las
39b7(brgyad stong): bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ /kau shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog /kau shi ka yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod
39b8(brgyad stong): pa de dag thams cad las sems can de dag re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho ba'i bar du lha'i me tog dang
40a1(brgyad stong): l ha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba
40a2(brgyad stong): dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems ci sems can de dag thams cad
40a3(brgyad stong): de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
40a4(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo 'dis bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang
40a5(brgyad stong): b a dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang 'di'i don rnam par
40a6(brgyad stong): 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i
40a7(brgyad stong): chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngam bzhag
40a8(brgyad stong): la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod
40b1(brgyad stong): pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de'i gzhi las bsod nams ches mang du
40b2(brgyad stong): skyed do/ /kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la
40b3(brgyad stong): n am 'tsho'i bar du lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i
40b4(brgyad stong): phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dang gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed pa lta zhog /kau shi ka yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
40b5(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang su dag yod pa de dag thams cad yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la de dag las kyang sems can re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten
40b6(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ byed du bcug nas kyang sems can re res kyang mchod rten de dag thams cad bzhag ste/ bskal pa 'am bskal pa bas lhag par sil snyan thams cad dang glu
40b7(brgyad stong): d byangs thams cad dang gar thams cad dang rol mo dang pheg rdob thams cad dang lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal
40b8(brgyad stong): mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan thams cad dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha dang mi rnams kyi mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag thams cad kyis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par
41a1(brgyad stong): byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed la/ sems can de dag thams cad kyis de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi bsod nams bya ba des mchod rten gzhal du med pa grangs med pa dag byed du bcug la de
41a2(brgyad stong): lta bu'i ngo bo'i mchod pa dag kyang byed du bcug na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems ci sems can de dag thams cad de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar
41a3(brgyad stong): gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dis bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing
41a4(brgyad stong): mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed
41a5(brgyad stong): pa dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang de'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad
41a6(brgyad stong): par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par
41a7(brgyad stong): 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngam bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu
41a8(brgyad stong): dang ba dan dag dang khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka rigs kyi
41b1(brgyad stong): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de'i gzhi las bsod nams che ba mang du skyed do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no
41b2(brgyad stong): bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la bkur stir bgyid pa dang bla mar bgyid pa dang rjed par bgyid pa dang mchod par bgyid pa dang ri mor bgyid pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyid pa'i
41b3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis yongs su mkhyen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na
41b4(brgyad stong): bzhugs pa rnams la shin du bkur stir bgyis pa dang bla mar bgyis pa dang rjed par bgyis pa dang mchod par bgyis pa dang ri mor bgyis pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis stong
41b5(brgyad stong): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog / bcom ldan 'das yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can gang ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams
41b6(brgyad stong): cad kyis kyang sems can re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can re re bgyid du stsal pa/ bgyid du stsal nas kyang sems can de dag re res mchod rten de dag thams cad
41b7(brgyad stong): bzhag ste/ bskal pa 'am bskal pa bas lhag par sil snyan thams cad dang glu dbyangs thams cad dang gar thams cad dang rol mo dang pheg rdob pa thams cad dang lha'i me tog thams cad dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang /
