79a6(brgyad stong): yang bgyi bar sla ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed de/ gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
79a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bri ba byas nas byin zhing nye bar gtad de don dang
79a8(brgyad stong): bcas shing yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar ston pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa'o/ /kau shi ka yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog par gyur pa la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nye
79b1(brgyad stong): bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog / kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la de
79b2(brgyad stong): dag la yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba byas nas byin zhing nye bar gtad la don dang bcas shing yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar ston pa dang / kau shi ka yang gling
79b3(brgyad stong): chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog par gyur pa la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog / kau shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi
79b4(brgyad stong): k hams na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la de dag la yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di glegs
79b5(brgyad stong): bam la bri ba byas nas byin zhing nye bar gtad de don dang bcas shing yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar ston pa dang / kau shi ka yang stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog par gyur pa la shes rab kyi pha
79b6(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog / kau shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
79b7(brgyad stong): c hub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba byas nas byin zhing nye bar gtad de don dang bcas shing yi ge dang bcas pa nye
79b8(brgyad stong): bar ston pa dang / kau shi ka yang stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog par gyur pa la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog /

80a7(brgyad stong): 'das bsod nams kyi phung po de bgrang bar yang dper yang dpes bstan par bgyi bar yang rten du yang rgyur yang bgyi bar sla ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs

84b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa rab 'byor theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas dngang zhing kun du skrag la kun du skrag pa dang

84b4(brgyad stong): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa dang rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems yongs su bsngo bar byed pas ji ltar rjes su
84b5(brgyad stong): yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems de legs par yongs su bzung zhing legs par yongs su bsngos par 'gyur/ de nas gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la
84b6(brgyad stong): brtsams shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa gzhir byas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la smras pa/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
84b7(brgyad stong): p hyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med cing grangs med pa yod pa'i phyogs re re'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'das pa'i sangs
84b8(brgyad stong): r gyas bcom ldan 'das lam chad pa 'jug pa chad pa spros pa dang srid par 'dren pa chad pa mchi ma zad pa tsher ma bcom pa khur shin du bor ba bdag gi don rjes su thob pa srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad pa yang dag par kun
85a1(brgyad stong): s hes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol du son pa gzhal du med cing grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
85a2(brgyad stong): gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las

85a4(brgyad stong): g i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa rnams dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang rnam par grol
85a5(brgyad stong): ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa rnams dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gzhal du

85a8(brgyad stong): dag gis gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshul khrims las
85b1(brgyad stong): byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / chos de la so so'i skye bo gang dag gis
85b2(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gis chos de thos te thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / byol song gi

85b7(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems gang gis gang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la sems su 'du shes par ma gyur na de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

86a1(brgyad stong): par mi shes pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log par mi 'gyur sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur lta ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ste sems gang gis gang

89b2(brgyad stong): pa dang lung ston par 'gyur ba dang lung ston pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag rang byang chub la lung bstan
89b3(brgyad stong): pa dang lung ston par 'gyur ba dang lung ston pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshul khrims las byung ba'i dge ba'i
89b4(brgyad stong): rtsa ba dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnam dang mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / chos de la so
89b5(brgyad stong): so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang skrun par 'gyur ba dang skrun pa dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag
89b6(brgyad stong): gis kyang chos de thos par gyur pa dang thos par 'gyur ba dang thos pa dang thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang skyed par 'gyur ba dang skyed pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can gang dag gis dam
89b7(brgyad stong): ba'i chos de thos par gyur pa dang thos par 'gyur ba dang thos pa dang thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang skrun par 'gyur ba dang skrun pa dang / sems can gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
89b8(brgyad stong): y ongs su mya dan las 'das pa dang yongs su mya can las 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang skrun par 'gyur ba dang skrun pa de rnams thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
90a1(brgyad stong): y in pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te bsdoms shing gzhal nas ma lus par byas te rjes su yi rang bar bya ba ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba dam pa dang gtso bo dang rab
90a2(brgyad stong): d ang mchog rab dang gya nom pa dang bla ma dang bla na med pa dang gong na med pa dang mnyam pa med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang la de ltar rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams
90a3(brgyad stong): b ya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su sgrub par gyur cig snyam pas ngag tu rjod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
90a4(brgyad stong): chen po de ji ltar 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur zhe na/ gal te yongs su sngo bar byed pa 'di snyam du chos de dag ni zad pa 'gags pa bral ba rnam par gyur
90a5(brgyad stong): pa yin pas gang du chos de zad par mi 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o zhes sems pa de lta na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no/ /gal te yang 'di ltar chos kyis ni chos yongs
90a6(brgyad stong): su mi bsngo'o snyam du nye bar rtog pa de lta na yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
90a7(brgyad stong): ni 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni yongs su bsngo ba de la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /gal te yang 'di
90a8(brgyad stong): s nyam du sems kyis sems mi shes shing chos kyis chos mi shes so zhes yang dag par shes pa de lta na yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
90b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba bla na med pa'o/ /gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de shes na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos
90b2(brgyad stong): pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de ni yongs su bsngo ba de la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te yang de 'di snyam du bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de yang dben pa zhi ba'o rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod
90b3(brgyad stong): nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de yang dben pa zhi ba'o zhes sems pa de ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no/ /gal te de 'du byed thams cad ni dben pa'o zhi ba'o snyam du de ltar
90b4(brgyad stong): yang mi shes pa de ltar na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin no/ /gang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de ci 'dra
90b5(brgyad stong): ba ltar yongs su bsngo ba de dang de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang de 'dra ba nyid de/ gang gis de yongs su bsngos pa de yang de'i rigs can de'i mtshan nyid can de'i ris su gtogs pa de'i rang bzhin can yin par gal te de ltar shes na bla na med pa
90b6(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba gnang bar mi mdzad do/ /gang 'das pa de
90b7(brgyad stong): ni zad pa 'gags pa bral ba rnam par gyur pa'o/ /gang ma 'ongs pa de yang ma thob pa'o/ /da ltar byung ba de la ni gnas pa mi dmigs la/ gang mi dmigs pa de ni mtshan ma ma yin zhing yul ma yin
90b8(brgyad stong): par gal te de ltar mtshan mar byed cing mi sems na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ma yin no/ /de ste dran pa dang bral bas mtshan mar mi byed cing mi sems pa dang / dran
91a1(brgyad stong): pa dang bral ba 'am khong du ma chud pas yid la mi byed na de lta na yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ma yin no/ /de ste mtshan ma de la sems shing mtshan mar mi byed na de ltar na byang chub
91a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di la bslab par bya ste 'di ni byang chub
91a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i thabs mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /gang thabs mkhas pa 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba yin no/ /thabs mkhas pa 'di la slob par
91a4(brgyad stong): ' dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid rgyun mi 'chad par mnyan par bya bzung bar bya bcang bar bya klag par bya kun chub par bya rab tu gdon par bya bstan par bya nye bar bstan
91a5(brgyad stong): par bya lung dbog par bya kha ton du bya yongs su dri bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ma brten par thos pa dang mi ldan pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yongs su bsngo ba'i bya ba 'di la
91a6(brgyad stong): 'jug mi nus so/ /de la gang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la ma brten kyang bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar nus so zhes zer na/ de la de skad ma
91a7(brgyad stong): zer cig ces brjod par bya ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gi dngos po de dag 'gags pa dang 'du byed de dag kyang 'gags pa ste zhi ba dben pa dmigs pa dang bral ba yin no/ /'on kyang gang zag
91a8(brgyad stong): de ni yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid la mtshan mar byas shing rnam par brtags nas yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin ma yin pa la yang dag pa ji ltar bar 'du shes pas dmigs pa la mi dmigs par yongs su sngo bar byed pa yin te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gnang bar mi mdzad do/
91b1(brgyad stong): /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
91b2(brgyad stong): rnams kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mtshan mar byed cing rnam par rtog pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam par dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid de'i dmigs pa chen po yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
91b3(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi yongs su bsngo ba don chen po byed pa'o zhes mi gsung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas shing zug rngu dang bcas
91b4(brgyad stong): pa yin no/ /'di lta ste dper na kha zas bzang po dug can zhig yod la de bzhin du de'i kha dog dang dri dang ro dang reg pa'i sgo nas 'dod par bya ba yang yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dug dang bcas pa yin pas na mkhas pa
91b5(brgyad stong): rnams kyis yongs su spang bar bya ba yin gyi yongs su longs spyad par bya ba ma yin no/ /de nyid skyes bu byis pa'i rang bzhin can shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can gyis yongs su longs spyad par
91b6(brgyad stong): bsams te/ des zas de za ba na de'i kha dog dang dri dang ro dang reg pa'i sgo nas myangs pa na bde bar byed la zhu ba'i tshe de la rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te de de'i gzhi las shi ba 'am shi ba
91b7(brgyad stong): tsam gyi sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di la kha cig log par zin cing log par rig pa dang log par kha ton byas pas legs par smras pa'i don ma shes shing don yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du khong du ma chud
91b8(brgyad stong): pa dag / 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyed tshur sheg 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med cing grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams
92a1(brgyad stong): k yi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang rgya ba'i bar dang phung po 'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
92a2(brgyad stong): su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang 'da' ba'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur pa dang nub par mi 'gyur ba dang ma nub pa'i bar te/ bar de'i 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
92a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang /
92a4(brgyad stong): lung ston par 'gyur ba dang lung ston pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun
92a5(brgyad stong): pa dang skrun par 'gyur ba dang skrun pa gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag rang sang rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang lung ston par 'gyur ba dang lung ston pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang skrun par 'gyur ba

92a8(brgyad stong): bsdoms te gzhal nas ma lus par byas te ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang nas/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bsngo bar gyis shig ces 'doms
92b1(brgyad stong): shing rjes su ston par 'gyur te/ de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bas dug nyid du 'gyur te 'di lta ste dper na kha zas de dug dang bcas pa bzhin no/ /de ltar na dmigs pa'i 'du shes can

92b3(brgyad stong): pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang / ci ltar yongs su bzung na legs par yongs su bzung bar 'gyur zhing ji ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dang ji ltar
92b4(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu legs par yongs su bsngos par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba mi
92b5(brgyad stong): gdab par 'dod pa des dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad 'di ltar rjes su yi rang bar bya zhing 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
92b6(brgyad stong): kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de rigs gang yin pa dang ris gar gtogs pa dang ci 'dra ba dang rang bzhin gang yin pa dang mtshan nyid gang
92b7(brgyad stong): gis yod pa de bzhin du rjes su yi rang zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de ci ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis
92b8(brgyad stong): rjes su gnang ba de gzhin du bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o snyam pa ste/ de ltar rjes su yi rang zhing de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
93a1(brgyad stong): 'das rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar byas pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu legs par yongs su bsngos par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin
93a2(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la skur ba mi 'debs pa yin te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pas yongs su bsngo bar byed pa de'i yongs su bsngo ba de lta bu ni dug med pa'i yongs su bsngo
93a3(brgyad stong): ba yin yongs su bsngo ba chen po yin chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba yin/ yongs su rdzogs shing shin du yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can
93a4(brgyad stong): gyis/ tshul khrims gang yin pa dang ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang shes rab gang yin pa dang rnam par grol ba gang yin pa dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa gang yin pa ci ltar 'dod pa'i khams su mi gtogs
93a5(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi khams su mi gtogs gzugs med pa'i khams su mi gtogs pa dang / 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dus gsum
93a6(brgyad stong): dang khams gsum du ma gtogs pa'i phyir de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba yang ma gtogs pa'o/ /chos gang du yongs su bsngo ba des yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de yang ma gtogs pa'o/ /gal te de ltar mos shing de ltar yongs
93a7(brgyad stong): s u bsngo na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar yongs su bsngo bar byed pa de'i yongs su bsngo ba ni chud ma zos pa yin te ma gtogs pa'i yongs su bsngo ba yongs su bsngo ba dug med pa yongs su bsngo ba chen po chos kyi
93a8(brgyad stong): dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba yongs su rdzogs shing legs par yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ /de ste yongs su bsngo ba de la mngon par chags shing mtshan mar byed na log par yongs su bsngo ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
93b1(brgyad stong): s ems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba gang zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba de ci ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mkhyen cing ci ltar rjes su gnang ba de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
93b2(brgyad stong): chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de ltar de legs par yongs su bsngos pa yin no snyam zhing / de ltar bdag gis yongs su bsngo'o snyam na 'di ni yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba yin te/ de ltar yongs su bsngos pa ni bla na med pa yang
93b3(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu legs par yongs su bsngos pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod ston pa'i bya ba byed cing gang khyod byang chub
93b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos ston pa ni rab 'byor legs so legs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings
93b5(brgyad stong): kyi yongs su bsngo ba'o/ /chos nyid 'di nyid la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ci ltar mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba de rigs gang yin pa dang ris gar gtogs pa dang ci 'dra ba dang rang bzhin gang yin pa dang mtshan
93b6(brgyad stong): nyid gang yin pa dang chos nyid gang gis yod pa de ltar rjes su yi rang ba dang / ci ltar rjes su gnang ba de ltar bdag gis yongs su bsngo'o snyam pa 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
93b7(brgyad stong): ' jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par bkod cing bzhag pa'i bsod nams
93b8(brgyad stong): m ngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba las skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di nyid mchog ces bya'o dam pa zhes bya'o gtso bo zhes bya'o rab ces
94a1(brgyad stong): bya'o mchog rab ces bya'o gya nom pa zhes bya'o bla ma zhes bya'o bla na med pa zhes bya'o gong na med pa zhes bya'o mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen
94a2(brgyad stong): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
94a3(brgyad stong): ' jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bsam gtan bzhi thob par gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
94a4(brgyad stong): c hen po'i yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di ni mchog ces bya'o dam pa zhes bya'o gtso bo zhes bya'o rab ces bya'o mchog rab ces bya'o gya nom pa zhes bya'o bla ma zhes bya'o bla na med pa zhes bya'o gong na med pa zhes bya'o mnyam pa
94a5(brgyad stong): med pa zhes bya'o mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bsam gtan bzhi rdzogs
94a6(brgyad stong): par gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad tshad med pa bzhi thob par
94a7(brgyad stong): gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad tshad med pa bzhi thob pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog /
94a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / rab 'byor
94b1(brgyad stong): yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog / rab 'byor
94b2(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
94b3(brgyad stong): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i
94b4(brgyad stong): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams
94b5(brgyad stong): cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams
94b6(brgyad stong): cad lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon
94b7(brgyad stong): par 'du byed pa lta zhog / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong
94b8(brgyad stong): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
95a1(brgyad stong): khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom par gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
95a2(brgyad stong): sems can thams cad dgra bcom par gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams
95a3(brgyad stong): cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog /

95a5(brgyad stong): cad kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gzhan dang gzhan dag nyid na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad la/ byang chub sems dpa' re res chos gos dang bsod snyoms
95a6(brgyad stong): dang / mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas te sbyin pa de yang dmigs pa'i 'du shes
95a7(brgyad stong): kyis byin la/ rnam grangs des na yongs su brtags nas sems can de rnams thams cad las re re la dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad las kyang byang chub sems dpa' re res bskal pa gang gA'i
95a8(brgyad stong): klung gi bye ma snyed du chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed
95b1(brgyad stong): rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed de/ de bzhin du re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis rnam grangs 'dis sbyin pa byin zhing / de bzhin du thams cad la yang sbyin pa byin na rab 'byor de ci
95b2(brgyad stong): snyam du sems ci byang chub sems dpa' de dag de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das gzhal du ma mchis so/ /
95b3(brgyad stong): bde bar gshegs pa gzhal du ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni grangs su bgyi bar yang sla ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni bgrang bar yang dper yang dpes bstan par
95b4(brgyad stong): bgyi bar yang gzhir yang rgyur yang bgyi bar sla ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bsod nams kyi phung po de gzugs can zhig lags na ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang mi
95b5(brgyad stong): shong bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor yang gang gi phyir gang zag byang chub
95b6(brgyad stong): s ems dpa'i theg pa can shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa
95b7(brgyad stong): de'i phyir de'i bsod nams mang du skyed de/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba las skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
95b8(brgyad stong): rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang brgya phrag stong gi char yang bye ba'i char yang bye ba phrag brgya'i char yang bye ba phrag stong gi char
96a1(brgyad stong): yang bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /grangs su yang nye bar mi 'gro bgrang bar yang dper yang dpes bstan par bya bar yang gzhir yang rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /
96a2(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar snga ma dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa ni shin du mang po byin na yang shin du mang por yang grangs su de 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag
96a3(brgyad stong): nyi shu rnams thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs
96a4(brgyad stong): su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa 'di ni yongs su bsngo ba chen po lags te/ 'di ltar gang du dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams
96a5(brgyad stong): mngon par 'du byed pa de snyed kyang zil gyis mnan pa lags so/ /de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu brgya phrag stong gis lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma
96a6(brgyad stong): rnams kyi char dang lha'i rin po che'i char dang lha'i na bza'i char gyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang lha'i
96a7(brgyad stong): mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir byas bla mar byas rjed par byas mchod par byas ri mor byas bsnyen bkur byas te lha'i sil snyan rnams rab tu dkrol nas tshig 'di skad ces
96a8(brgyad stong): gsol to/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni bsngo ba chen po lags te/ 'di ltar gang du dmigs pa can gyi byang chub sems
96b1(brgyad stong): dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bgyid pa'i phung po chen po de snyed kyang zil gyis gnon pa lags so/ /'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thams mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba'i slad du
96b2(brgyad stong): 'di ni bsngo ba chen po lags so/ /de bzhin du lha'i ris gzhan dag nas kyang lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir bya ba dam pa dang bla mar bya ba dam pa dang rjed par bya ba dam pa dang mchod par bya ba dam pa dang ri mor bya ba dam pa dang
96b3(brgyad stong): bsnyen bkur bya ba dam pa rnams kyis/ bkur stir byas bla mar byas rjed par byas mchod par byas ri mor byas bsnyen bkur byas nas de skad du sgra phyung zhing dbyangs rjes su bsgrags so/ /de bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste 'thab
96b4(brgyad stong): bral dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang tshangs ris dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang tshangs 'khor dang tshangs chen dang 'od chung dang tshad med 'od dang 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang tshad med dge dang
96b5(brgyad stong): dge rgyas dang sprin med dang bsod nams 'phel dang 'bras bu che dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang gya nom snang dang shin du mthong dang 'og min gyi lha de dag kyang de bzhin du thal mo sbyar te
96b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i
96b7(brgyad stong): rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba des byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi yun ring po de tsam du bsags pa dang de ltar rgya cher yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de snyed kyang zil gyis gnon pa ngo mtshar to/ /
96b8(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu la sogs te lha'i bu de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi
97a1(brgyad stong): s ems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i don du sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams mngon
97a2(brgyad stong): par 'du byed pa lta zhog / lha'i bu dag rnam grangs 'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gzhan dag dang gzhan dag na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang
97a3(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gzhan dag dang gzhan dag gi sems can thams cad la chos gos dang
97a4(brgyad stong): bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang bde ba reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug ste sbyin pa byin

97a6(brgyad stong): brtags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' re re nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad kyi bar gyis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug ste/ sems can de dag thams cad la chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang

97a8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa zhig gis/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang gang zag
97b1(brgyad stong): nyan thos kyi theg pa can de rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong pa'i phung po dang / de la sems can gzhan dag
97b2(brgyad stong): gis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskrun pa dang skrun par 'gyur ba dang skrun par byed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te gzhal nas ma lus par byas te/ ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang zhing dam
97b3(brgyad stong): pa dang gtso bo dang rab dang mchog rab dang gya nom pa dang bla ma dang bla na med pa dang gong na med pa dang gong ma'i yang gong ma dang mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang rab tu mnyam pa med pa dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su

97b6(brgyad stong): bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang brgya stong gi char yang bye ba'i char yang bye ba brgya'i char yang bye ba stong gi char yang bye ba brgya stong gi char yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /grangs su yang bgrang

97b8(brgyad stong): sbyin par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
98a1(brgyad stong): to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang /

98a3(brgyad stong): mchog gis rjes su yi rang zhing dam pa dang gtso bo dang rab dang mchog rab dang gya nom pa dang bla ma dang bla na med pa dang gong na med pa dang gong ma'i yang gong ma dang mnyam pa med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang rab tu mnyam pa med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang la zhes gang gsungs pa de la/

98a6(brgyad stong): rnam par mi rtog yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing chos de dag la 'di ltar yang yongs su rtog ste chos thams cad ni rtog pas rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/ ma skyes pa nges par ma skyes pa 'ong ba med pa 'gro ba med pa'o/ /

98b1(brgyad stong): gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba 'di la byang chub sems dpa' snga ma dmigs par 'du shes pa dang dmigs par lta ba de dag gi

98b6(brgyad stong): d u tshul khrims so rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du bzod pa'o rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du brtson 'grus so rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du bsam gtan no rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du shes rab bo rnam par
98b7(brgyad stong): grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du rnam par grol ba'o/ /rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o/ /rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /rnam
98b8(brgyad stong): par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po'o/ /rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba'o/ /rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan
99a1(brgyad stong): 'das rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ngo / /rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du chos gang
99a2(brgyad stong): dag 'das shing 'gags pa de rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du chos gang dag ma 'ongs pa ma byung ba de rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du chos gang dag da ltar byung ba gnas bzhin pa rnams so/ /
99a3(brgyad stong): rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang de dag gi nyan thos rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang de dag gi nyan thos rnams so/ /
99a4(brgyad stong): rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du gang dag da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med cing grangs med pa rnams na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang de dag gi nyan thos rnams so/ /rnam
99a5(brgyad stong): par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/ de ltar ma bcings shing ma grol la ma chags pa'i chos 'di dag gi chos nyid gang yin pa de la rjes su yi rang ba bla na med pas
99a6(brgyad stong): rjes su yi rang ngo / /rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mi bsngo ba'i tshul gyis mi 'pho ba dang mi 'jig pas yongs su
99a7(brgyad stong): bsngo'o zhes bya ba'o/ /rab 'byor 'di tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog yin no/ /rab 'byor yang gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
99a8(brgyad stong): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gzhan dag dang gzhan dag na yod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

104a3(brgyad stong): slad du 'khor ba'i gnyen po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor
104a4(brgyad stong): lo lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba yongs su rdzogs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan
104a5(brgyad stong): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ji ltar yid la bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ji ltar phyag 'tshal bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad
104a6(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu ston pa la ci lta bar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar gnas par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu ston pa la ci lta bar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar yid la bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu ston pa la ci lta bar
104a7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar phyag bya'o/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o 'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir 'di 'dri bar gyur/ kye ma 'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i gzhi las 'di 'dri bar
104a8(brgyad stong): gyur snyam mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i gzhi las 'di 'dri bar gyur/ de skad
104b1(brgyad stong): ces smras pa dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su yi
104b2(brgyad stong): rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can snga ma de dag thams cad kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang
104b3(brgyad stong): yin pa dang / tshul khrims las byung ba gang yin pa dang bzod pa las byung ba gang yin pa dang brtson 'grus las byung ba gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad
104b4(brgyad stong): zil gyis gnon te/ des na bdag ni gzhi 'di las 'di 'dri bar gyur to/ /kau shi ka yang 'on kyang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam du 'jug pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid sngon du 'gro ba yin no/ /
104b5(brgyad stong): kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na dmus long brgya 'am stong ngam brgya stong yang rung yongs su 'dren pa med na lam du 'jug pa'i skal ba med cing grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal du 'gro ba'i skal ba med do/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du sbyin pa dang tshul khrims
104b6(brgyad stong): dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bas ni pha rol du phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob cing dmus long du gyur pa yin te/ yongs su 'dren pa med pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam du
104b7(brgyad stong): 'jug pa'i skal ba yang med na thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer chen por 'jug pa 'am rjes su thob par lta yang ga la 'gyur/ kau shi ka yang gang gi tshe sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan rnams
104b8(brgyad stong): s hes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su bzung bar gyur pa de'i tshe pha rol du phyin pa'i ming dang pha rol du phyin pa'i sgra 'thob ste de'i tshe ni pha rol du phyin pa lnga po 'di dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam du 'jug pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i rjes su
105a1(brgyad stong): thob par bya ba'i don du mig rab tu thob pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
105a2(brgyad stong): mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu gzugs mngon par mi sgrub par blta'o/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du
105a3(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa mngon par mi sgrub par blta'o/ /shA ri'i bu phung po lnga rnams mngon par mi sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mngon par sgrub pa zhes rjod do/ /de ltar mngon par 'du mi byed pas phung
105a4(brgyad stong): po lnga rnams la mngon par sgrub pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mngon par sgrub pa ste mngon par sgrub pa zhes brjod do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
105a5(brgyad stong): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ltar mngon par bsgrubs pas chos gang zhig gtod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ltar mngon par bsgrubs pas ni chos gang yang
105a6(brgyad stong): gtod par mi byed do/ /shA ri'i bu gang gi tshe chos gang yang gtod par mi byed pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
105a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gtod par mi bgyid lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka 'di skad du ci shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
105a8(brgyad stong): gtod par mi bgyid lags sam zhes zer ba ni/ ci ltar dmigs pa de ltar gtod par mi byed do/ /ming ci lta ba de ltar gtod par mi byed do/ /mngon par 'du byed pa ci lta ba de ltar gtod par mi byed do/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
105b1(brgyad stong): 'das 'o na ci ltar gtod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka ci ltar gtod par mi byed pa de ltar gtod par byed do/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci srid du gang gis shes rab kyi sa rol du phyin
105b2(brgyad stong): pa 'dis chos gang yang mi skyed mi 'gog pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas la gnas pa yang ma lags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
105b3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar yang 'du shes par bgyid na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ring du bgyid shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
105b4(brgyad stong): gsog du bgyid shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gsob tu bgyid de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mi bgyid pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
105b5(brgyad stong): de de bzhin no rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di rgyang ring du byed pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gsog tu byed pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gsob du byed pa dang /
105b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mi byed par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs 'di ni yod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yongs su gsal bar byas na gzugs yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ tshor ba
105b7(brgyad stong): ma yin 'du shes ma yin 'du byed rnams ma yin rnam par shes pa yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma
105b8(brgyad stong): yin phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas nyid yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin sangs rgyas nyid yongs su gsal bar byas
106a1(brgyad stong): pa ma yin no/ /gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ci snyam du sems rnam grangs
106a2(brgyad stong): gang gis 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di pha rol du phyin pa chen po yin/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs chen por mi bgyid chung ngur mi bgyid gzugs sdud par mi bgyid g.yengs par mi
106a3(brgyad stong): bgyid do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba ma lags 'du shes ma lags 'du byed rnams ma lags te bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa chen por mi bgyid chung ngur mi bgyid rnam par shes pa sdud par mi bgyed g.yengs par mi bgyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs
106a4(brgyad stong): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gang lags pa de dag kyang stobs dang ldan par yang mi bgyid stobs ma mchis par yang mi bgyid sdud par mi bgyid g.yengs par mi bgyid do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa gang lags pa de yang chen por
106a5(brgyad stong): mi bgyid chung ngur mi bgyid sdud par mi bgyid g.yengs par mi bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma bsdus ma g.yengs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen
106a6(brgyad stong): po gal te de ltar 'tshal na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags na/ bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa ste 'di ltar sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o 'di ltar sems can 'di dag yongs su mya ngan
106a7(brgyad stong): las bzla bar bya'o snyam du 'tshal ba lta smos su ci mchis/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can 'di dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam pa gang lags pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa ma lags te sems can du dmigs
106a8(brgyad stong): pa 'di nyid de'i dmigs pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa dang skye ba ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bgyi ste/ sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pas na
106b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /sems can dben pas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben par rig par bgyi'o/ /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsam
106b2(brgyad stong): gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi'o/ /sems can mi 'jig pa'i chos nyid lags pas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi 'jig pa'i chos nyid du rig par bgyi'o/ /sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bas na shes rab kyi pha
106b3(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar rig par bgyi'o/ /sems can yang dag pa'i don ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag pa'i don ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs
106b4(brgyad stong): par 'tshang mi rgya bar rig par bgyi'o/ /sems can stobs yang dag par bsgrub pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yang dag par sgrub par rig par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
106b5(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab
106b6(brgyad stong): mo 'di la mos shing nem nur mi bgyid the tshom mi 'tshal rmongs par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de gang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i don dang chos nyid dang
106b7(brgyad stong): don gyi tshul dang chos nyid kyi tshul gyi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur la rjes su 'tshal bar 'gyur zhing / rjes su rtogs par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yun ring po ji srid gcig tu spyad cing tshul bsrungs
106b8(brgyad stong): par rig par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
107a1(brgyad stong): la bsnyen bkur byas shing yongs su dris nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la
107a2(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas shing / yongs su dris nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par gyur pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa dang nye
107a3(brgyad stong): bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa nyan te shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la ston par 'du shes skyed do/ /bdag gi ston pa mngon sum du gyur te bdag gi ston pa mthong ngo snyam du sems bskyed do/ /
107a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa la rna ba blags nas gus par nyan te gtam gyi bar chad mi byed do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yun ring
107a5(brgyad stong): por spyad cing tshul bsrungs pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin du rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa de lta bu'i tshul du rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
107a6(brgyad stong): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mnyan pa 'am rtogs pa 'am bsam pa 'am bskyed pa 'am nye bar bzung bar nus sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
107a7(brgyad stong): pa de ni 'di'o zhe 'am shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de 'di la'o zhe 'am shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ni ga ge mo zhig na'o zhes sam/ rnam pa dang rtags dang mtshan ma 'dis so zhes kyang bstan pa 'am mnyan par nus sam/ bcom ldan
107a8(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni phung po 'am khams sam skye mched du bstan pa 'am mnyan pa 'am rtogs pa 'am bsam pa 'am bskyed pa 'am nye bar bzung bar mi nus so/ /
107b1(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad dben pa nyid dang chos thams cad shin du dben pa nyid yin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bstan pa 'am mnyan pa 'am rtogs pa 'am bsam pa 'am bskyed pa 'am nye bar
107b2(brgyad stong): bzung bar mi nus so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched las gzhan na yang med par rig par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor phung po dang khams dang skye mched nyid stong pa dben pa zhi bas so/ /
107b3(brgyad stong): de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang phung po dang khams dang skye mched 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /stong pa dang dben pa dang zhi ba'i phyir dmigs su med de/ chos thams cad kyi mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes
107b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes brjod do/ /gang gi tshe 'du shes dang kun shes pa dang btags pa dang tha snyad mi 'byung ba de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
107b5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa de yun ring po ji srid cig spyad cing tshul bsrungs par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
107b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dbang po'i rim pa yod pas 'di ni rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bya ba yin no/ /rab 'byor yang rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas brgya
107b7(brgyad stong): p hrag mang po dang sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dag mthong nas de dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la ma dad ma mos par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs
107b8(brgyad stong): kyang yod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thad nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa la ma gus so ma gus pas legs par mi nyan to/ /
108a1(brgyad stong): legs par mi nyan pas bsnyen bkur mi byed do bsnyen bkur mi byed pas yongs su mi 'dri'o yongs su ma dris pas mngon par mi dad do mngon par ma dad pas 'khor de nas 'byol te/ de dag gzhi de las chos kyis phongs par 'gyur
108a2(brgyad stong): p a dang 'thun pa'i las byas shing bsags la kun nas bsags shing nye bar bsags pas da ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa na ma gus pas 'byol zhing ma dad la mos par mi byed pas
108a3(brgyad stong): lus dang sems kyis tshogs pa sgrub par mi byed do/ /tshogs pa sgrub par mi byed pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mi shes mi mthong khong du mi chud rig par mi byed de/ de dag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ma dad
108a4(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ro ma dad pa ni mi nyan to mi nyan pa ni mi shes so ma shes pas ni mi mthong ngo ma mthong bas ni khong du mi chud do/ /khong du ma chud pa ni chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa'i las byed yang dag par sogs par byed/
108a5(brgyad stong): kun du sogs par byed nye bar sogs par byed do/ /de dag chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa'i las byas pa dang bsags pa dang kun nas bsags pa dang nye bar bsags pa des shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba dang
108a6(brgyad stong): 'thun pa'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa dang bsags pa dang kun nas bsags pa dang nye bar bsags pa des shes rab kyi pha rol
108a7(brgyad stong): du phyin pa 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa na spong bar 'gyur skur bar 'gyur mi snyan pa brjod par 'gyur te/ skur nas kyang 'byol bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di spong ba dang skur pa dang mi
108a8(brgyad stong): snyan par brjod pas ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spangs par 'gyur skur bar 'gyur mi snyan par brjod par 'gyur te/ de dag ni rang gi rgyud
108b1(brgyad stong): bcom zhing bsregs nas blo chung ba shes rab chung ba bsod nams chung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i gang zag dad pa tsam dang ldan pa dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa/ dang ba tsam dang ldan pa 'dun pa tsam dang ldan pa las dang po pa skal ba med
108b2(brgyad stong): pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan rnams kyi yang dad pa tsam dang dga' ba tsam dang dang ba tsam dang 'dun pa tsam de yang phyir zlog cing 'bral bar byed ldog par byed de/ 'di la bslab par mi bya'o zhes smra zhing 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung ma
108b3(brgyad stong): yin no zhes tshig tu brjod par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag bdag gi rgyud bcom zhing phral te gzhan gyi rgyud kyang bcom zhing phral nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skur ba 'debs par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
108b4(brgyad stong): skur ba btab na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skur ba btab par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skur ba btab na 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skur ba btab par 'gyur ro/ /
108b5(brgyad stong): de ltar de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung nas 'byol bar 'gyur chos kyis yongs su btang bar 'gyur dge 'dun las yongs su phyi rol du 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de rnams thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams
108b6(brgyad stong): cad du thams cad dkon mchog gsum las phyi rol du 'gyur te/ de dag sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gcod par byed pas sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa'i las nye
108b7(brgyad stong): bar sogs par 'gyur ro/ /de dag de lta bu'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang nye bar bzhag pa dang kun nas bslang ba dang chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa dang shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa'i rang
108b8(brgyad stong): b zhin de nyid kyis lo brgya phrag mang po dang lo stong phrag mang po dang lo brgya stong phrag mang po dang lo bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang lo bye ba stong phrag mang po dang lo bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang por
109a1(brgyad stong): sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de dag de ltar yun ring por sems can dmyal ba chen po nas
109a2(brgyad stong): sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho ba na mes 'jig pa'i bskal pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mes 'jig pa'i bskal pa byung ba na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sems can dmyal ba chen po gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'dor bar
109a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur te de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /der bor te sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu ltung bar gyur pa de dag der yang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por

109a8(brgyad stong): zhing bor bar gyur pa na yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag slar sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal chen po de dag myong bar 'gyur te ji srid
109b1(brgyad stong): du mes 'jig pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de srid du myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag sdug bsngal mang po myong ba dang 'thun pa'i las nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de lta bu'i tshig nyes pa smras pa'i phyir ro/ /
109b2(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i las bgyis shing nye bar bsags pa rnams ni/ yid kyis nongs par spyad pa dang ngag gis nongs
109b3(brgyad stong): par spyad pa 'di'i gzugs brnyan nam rjes su 'thun pa 'am tshul mthun pa tsam yang ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu mtshams med pa lnga'i las
109b4(brgyad stong): b yas shing nye bar bsags pa rnams ni yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ngag gis nyes par spyad pa'i las byas shing bsags te kun nas bsags pa dang nye bar bsags pa 'di'i gzugs brnyan nam rjes su 'thun
109b5(brgyad stong): pa 'am tshul mthun pa tsam yang ma yin no/ /gang su dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa la phyir gzhil bar sems shing skur par 'gyur mi snyan par zer bar 'gyur te/
109b6(brgyad stong): 'di la bslab par mi bya'o zhes smra bar 'gyur la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa ma yin no zhes tshig smra bar 'gyur zhing sems can gzhan dag kyang de dang bral bar byed pa de dag ni rang gi rgyud bcom nas gzhan
109b7(brgyad stong): gyi rgyud kyang 'joms par 'gyur/ rang gi rgyud dug can du byas nas gzhan gyi rgyud kyang dug can du byed par 'gyur/ rang nyid brlag nas gzhan yang brlag par byed par 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
109b8(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa zab mo ma shes ma rtogs la gzhan dag kyang 'di la bslab par mi bya'o zhes 'dzin du 'jug pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu'i rang bzhin can ni blta bar yang ngas mi gnang na de dag dang 'grogs
110a1(brgyad stong): pa lta ci smos rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta ci smos gnas pa lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi gang zag de dag ni chos la sun 'byin par rig par bya ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu gang zag
110a2(brgyad stong): de lta bu'i rang bzhin can de dag ni lo 'dab rul ba lta bur gyur par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu de dag ni nag po'i rang bzhin can nag po nye bar skyed par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu de dag
110a3(brgyad stong): las gang dag mnyan pa dang dad par bya bar sems pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul ma yin pas brlag par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sun 'byin pa de dag ni shA ri'i bu chos la sun 'byin pa'i
110a4(brgyad stong): gang zag tu rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag der skyes shing sems can dmyal ba chen po na mchis pa de'i lus kyi tshad ma bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

110a6(brgyad stong): ba 'am 'chi ba tsam 'am sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang nad kyis reg cing tshig pa 'am de la mya ngan gyi zug rngu zhugs pa 'am g.yang sa chen por ltung ba 'am skam pa 'am rnyis par gyur na mi rung bas na/ gang la nyes pa de dag
110a7(brgyad stong): yod pa'i lus de'i tshad 'jigs pa chen po can de lta bu thos par ma gyur cig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lus de'i tshad 'di tsam du 'gyur ro zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la go skabs ma phye'o/ /lan gnyis lan gsum
110a8(brgyad stong): du yang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang zag de'i lus kyi tshad kyis phyi ma'i skye bo la snang bar bgyis par 'gyur bas/ ngag dang yid kyi las byas shing bsags pa dang
110b1(brgyad stong): kun tu bsags pa dang nye bar bsags pa 'dis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i lus 'di lta bu chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das

110b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de ltar ngag gis nongs par smras pa de lta bu'i ngo bos bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po chen po 'di skyes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das yang las gang gis bsod nams ma lags
110b8(brgyad stong): pa'i phung po chen po 'di skyes par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ngag gis nyes par smras pa de lta bu'i ngo bos bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po 'di tsam skyes so/ /

111a2(brgyad stong): de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di nyid du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di phyir bcil na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub kyang phyir bcil

114a3(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas/ gzugs

114a5(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /
114a6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis
114a7(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
114a8(brgyad stong): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas thob pa ma mchis mngon par rtogs pa yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /
114b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag mu ma mchis pas na gzugs mu ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /
114b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag mu ma mchis pas na tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
114b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de ni 'di'i shes rab kyi pha
114b4(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang shes rab kyi pha
114b5(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshu rol gyi 'gram na yang mi gnas pha rol gyi 'gram na yang mi gnas gnyi ga'i bar rgyang ring po na yang mi gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam
114b6(brgyad stong): par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar yang 'du shes na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dor
114b7(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ring du bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs so legs so/ /de de bzhin no rab 'byor de de
114b8(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ming las kyang chags par 'gyur ro mtshan ma las kyang chags par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
115a1(brgyad stong): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gang du chags pa 'di dag kyang bshad pas ci tsam du shes rab gyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di legs par bshad cing
115a2(brgyad stong): legs par bstan te/ shin du mthar gtugs pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe ldan pa rab 'byor chags pa de dag gang
115a3(brgyad stong): yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs stong pa'o snyam pa ni chags pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa stong
115a4(brgyad stong): pa'o snyam pa ni chags pa'o/ /'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos rnams so zhes yang dag par shes pa ni chags pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams so zhes yang dag
115a5(brgyad stong): par shes pa ni chags pa'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams so zhes yang dag par shes pa ni chags pa'o/ /gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can sems dang po
115a6(brgyad stong): bskyed pas bsod nams kyi phung po 'di tsam skyed do zhes yang dag par shes pa ni chags pa'o/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags
115a7(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis chags par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gal te 'di ni byang chub kyi sems dang po'o zhes byang chub kyi sems de yang dag par shes shing bla na
115a8(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /zhes yongs su bsngo bar byed pas te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa des sems kyi rang bzhin
115b1(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo bar ni mi nus so/ /kau shi ka de bas na gzhan la yang dag par ston pa dang yang dag par 'god pa dang yang dag par gzeng stod pa dang yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par
115b2(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag pa nyid rjes su rtogs pas yang dag par bstan par bya yang dag par dgod par bya yang dag par gzeng stod par bya yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ste/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am
115b3(brgyad stong): r igs kyi bu mo de bdag nyid la yang gnod par mi byed cing sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par 'god pas gzhan 'god par byed par 'gyur la chags pa'i mtha' 'di dag thams cad kyang rnam par spangs par
115b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la chags pa'i mtha' 'di dag khong du chud
115b5(brgyad stong): par byed pa legs so legs so/ /rab 'byor de'i phyir chags pa rab tu phra ba gzhan dag kyang brjod par bya ste legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol
115b6(brgyad stong): nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
115b7(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na yang rab 'byor mtshan ma ji srid pa de srid du chags pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan ma las ni chags par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na de 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung
115b8(brgyad stong): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ngo / /de ltar rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
116a1(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo'o zhes yongs su bsngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor yang chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'das pa 'am ma 'ongs pa 'am da ltar byung ba ma yin/ gang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ma yin pa de ni dus

117a2(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du gal te tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin gal te rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs mi rtag pa'o zhes
