264a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i gnas pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa'i gnas pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ma gtogs par de ma yin pa'i gnas pa gzhan thams
264a7(brgyad stong): cad zil gyis gnon to/ /kau shi ka 'di ni gnas pa de dag thams cad pas mchog ces bya'o dam pa zhes bya'o gtso bo zhes bya'o rab ces bya'o mchog rab ces bya'o gya nom pa zhes bya'o bla ma zhes bya'o bla na med pa zhes bya'o gong na
264a8(brgyad stong): med pa zhes bya'o mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa 'dis ni nyan thos dang rang
264b1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /kau shi ka de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu phyin par 'dod pa dang dam par phyin par 'dod pa dang gtso bor phyin par 'dod pa dang rab du phyin par 'dod pa dang mchog
264b2(brgyad stong): rab tu phyin par 'dod pa dang gya nom par phyin par 'dod pa dang bla mar phyin par 'dod pa dang bla na med par phyin par 'dod pa dang / gong na med par phyin par 'dod pa dang mnyam pa med par phyin par 'dod pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
264b3(brgyad stong): par phyin par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i gnas 'dis gnas par bya'o/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi
264b4(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las snying po'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o/ / // bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu gzhan zhig sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig me tog man dA ra ba dang /
264b5(brgyad stong): man dA ra ba chen po thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su dong ngo / /de'i tshe na dge slong brgya phrag drug bcu 'khor der 'dus te 'khod par gyur nas de dag kyang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus
264b6(brgyad stong): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bcugs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus dge slong de dag gi snyim par me tog man dA ra ba dang man dA ra ba chen pos gang bar gyur
264b7(brgyad stong): n as de dag gis me tog man dA ra ba dang man dA ra ba chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces kyang
264b8(brgyad stong): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di spyad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnas pa bla na med pa 'dis gnas par bgyi'o/ /de nas
265a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni chos nyid yin te gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma 'di lta ste sngon po dang ser po
265a2(brgyad stong): dang dmar po dang dkar po dang btsod ka dang shel dang dngul dang gser gyi kha dog rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa thug pa med pa kun du snang bar byas nas
265a3(brgyad stong): gyen du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad du mngon par 'phags te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs
265a4(brgyad stong): te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis
265a5(brgyad stong): par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis
265a6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa skar ma lta bu la dge slong brgya phrag drug bcu po 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
265a7(brgyad stong): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyang ming gcig par 'gyur te 'di lta ste me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
265a8(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba de dag gi nyan thos kyi
265b1(brgyad stong): dge 'dun de dag thams cad mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba de dag thams cad kyi tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /
265b2(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad so so'i gsung rab kyang rgyas par 'gyur te lha dang mi'i nang du yangs shing rgya che bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad so so'i dam pa'i chos kyang bskal pa stong phrag nyi shu'i bar du mnyam par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
265b3(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang pho brang 'khor gang dang gang nas mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur pa dang / mngon par byung nas kyang gang dang gang du chos gyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ba dang
265b4(brgyad stong): rab tu bskor nas kyang gang dang gang du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang dang gang nas gang dang gang du 'jug pa dang / gang dang gang gis gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dang de nas de dang der 'jug pa dang 'byung ba dang gnas pa de dag la
265b5(brgyad stong): me tog kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i me tog gi char rab tu 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de lta bas na gnas pa mchog gis gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
265b6(brgyad stong): pa'i gnas pas gnas par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pas gnas par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnas pas gnas par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
265b7(brgyad stong): po gang su dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de dag ni mi las shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa 'am dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes par rtogs par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mi rnams dang dga'
265b8(brgyad stong): ldan gyi lha rnams na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di rgyas par rab du spyod do/ /kun dga' bo yang gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs par rig par
266a1(brgyad stong): bya'o/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang / chung ngu na yi ger 'bri ba dang bzung bcangs
266a2(brgyad stong): blags kun chub par byas rab tu bton bstan nye bar bstan lung phog kha ton du byas/ chung ngu na yi ger bris nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / yang
266a3(brgyad stong): dag par 'god pa dang / yang dag par gzeng stod pa dang rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
266a4(brgyad stong): la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin par rig bar bya'o/ /gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la slob pa de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'ba' shig gi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ma yin gyi kun dga' bo yang byang chub sems
266a5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la gdon mi za bar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la
266a6(brgyad stong): slob cing skrag par mi byed pa dang / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang chung du
266a7(brgyad stong): n a yi ger 'bri ba dang de ltar don dang chos nyid dang tshul gyis rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni kun dga' bo nges par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
266a8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon sum du gyur pa yin par rtogs par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la smod par mi byed 'gal bar mi byed 'khrug par mi byed 'jig par mi byed spong bar mi byed
266b1(brgyad stong): 'gog par mi byed gnod par bya bar mi sems na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la bya ba byas pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo 'di ltar yang gal te byang chub sems
266b2(brgyad stong): d pa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa slu bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

266b5(brgyad stong): chongs shig lhogs shig kun chub par gyis shig rab tu thon cig yun ring por gnas par gyis shig / kun dga' bo khyod kyis gal te shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma gtogs par chos gang ngas mngon sum du bshad pa'i chos bshad pa
266b6(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad bzung nas/ phyis rnam par chud gzan tam phyis btang ngam brjed par byas na kun dga' bo khyod de tsam gyis ngas nyes par brtsi bar mi 'gyur gyi/ kun dga' bo yang 'di ltar khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
266b7(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa'i tshig gi yan lag kyang rung ste chud gzan tam btang ngam brjed par byas na kun dga' bo khyod kyis de tsam du nga la nyes pa byas par 'gyur te khyod kyis nga'i sems kyang mgu bar ma byas so/ /kun dga' bo yang khyod kyis gal

269b6(brgyad stong): byas na/ kun dga' bo de ci snyam du sems dgra bcom pa de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams
269b7(brgyad stong): bya ba'i dngos po'i bsod nams kyi phung po de mang ba yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo nyan thos kyi
269b8(brgyad stong): theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag pas gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa de bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ /kun dga' bo de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
270a1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la chung du na nyi ma gcig tsam yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na de bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ /
270a2(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo nyi ma gcig lta zhog gi chung ngu na snga dro tsam 'am/ kun dga' bo snga dro chos ston pa lta zhog chung ngu na chu tshod gcig tsam 'am/ kun dga' bo chu tshod gcig lta zhog chung ngu na yud tsam 'am/ kun dga' bo yud tsam
270a3(brgyad stong): lta zhog thang gcig gam/ kun dga' bo thang gcig lta zhog chung ngu na skad cig gcig tsam du yang ste/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam du yang byang chub
270a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ /kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i chos
270a5(brgyad stong): kyi sbyin pa 'dis ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis gnon to/ /kun dga' bo de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
270a6(brgyad stong): c hen po dang de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la sems pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa ni kun dga' bo gnas med skabs med de
270a7(brgyad stong): 'di ni gnas ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ci lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi dang lha dang klu dang
270a8(brgyad stong): g nod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
270b1(brgyad stong): mi bskyod pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas pa mi bskyod pa rgya mtsho lta bu zab pa/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
270b2(brgyad stong): yon tan dang ldan pa dang / /dgra bcom pa thams cad kyang zag pa zad pa nyon mongs pa med pa dbang du gyur pa sems shin du rnam par grol ba shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba cang shes pa glang po chen po bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa khur bor
270b3(brgyad stong): b a rang gi don rjes su thob pa srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad pa yang dag par kun shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol du son pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te chos
270b4(brgyad stong): ston pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de dag slar brtul to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par
270b5(brgyad stong): 'du mdzad pa de slar brtul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa yang mi snang bar gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang nyan thos chen
270b6(brgyad stong): po de dag dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad 'khor bzhi po de dag lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag gi mig lam du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de
270b7(brgyad stong): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul bar gyur pas de dag thams cad de dag gi mig lam du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
270b8(brgyad stong): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ltar chos thams cad ni mig lam du yang snang bar mi 'gyur te chos rnams la chos rnams snang bar mi 'gyur chos rnams kyis chos rnams mi mthong chos rnams
271a1(brgyad stong): kyis chos rnams mi shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni shes pa po ma yin mthong ba po ma yin dgos pa byed nus pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo nam mkha'
271a2(brgyad stong): byed pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad byed pa med pa'o/ /kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po ma yin no/ /kun dga'
271a3(brgyad stong): bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa med do/ /kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes
271a4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob bo/ /bslab pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i byang chub chen po rjes su thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /
271a5(brgyad stong): de ce'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo bslab pa 'di dag ni bslab pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /rab ces bya'o/ /mchog rab ces bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla ma zhes bya'o/ /
271a6(brgyad stong): bla na med pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na med pa zhes bya'o/ /mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /'jig rten thams cad phan pa thob par byed pa'o/ /'jig rten thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa'o/ /
271a7(brgyad stong): mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis gnang zhing sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa ste/ kun dga' bo bslab pa 'di la bslabs shing bslab pa 'di la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
271a8(brgyad stong): d ag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhabs kyi mthe bo gcig gis bteg ste slar bzhag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 'di snyam du stong gsum gyi
271b1(brgyad stong): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bteg pa 'am bzhag par mi dgongs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gzhal du med grangs med pa'i yon tan dang ldan te/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan
271b2(brgyad stong): 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la bslabs nas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa nyid rjes su brnyes so/ /kun dga' bo 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i
271b3(brgyad stong): d us kyi bslab pa ci snyed yod pa'i bslab pa de dag thams cad las kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di ni mchog ces bya'o dam pa zhes bya'o gtso bo zhes bya'o rab ces bya'o mchog rab ces bya'o gya nom pa zhes bya'o bla
271b4(brgyad stong): ma zhes bya'o bla na med pa zhes bya'o gong na med pa zhes bya'o mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshad ma med pa'o/ /kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
271b5(brgyad stong): pa ni mi zad pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad ma 'am zad pa 'am mtha' ma bzung bar sems pa de ni nam mkha'i tshad ma
271b6(brgyad stong): 'am zad pa 'am mtha' ma bzung bar sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshad ma med pa'o/ /kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mi zad pa'o/ /kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du
271b7(brgyad stong): phyin pa ni mtha' ma med pa'o/ /kun dga' bo ngas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad ma 'am zad pa 'am mtha' ma ni ma bshad de/ kun dga' bo yang ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams la ni tshad ma dang
271b8(brgyad stong): 'brel ba yod kyi kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ni tshad ma dang 'brel ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /kun dga' bo ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang yi ge'i tshogs ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin
272a1(brgyad stong): te kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshad ma dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshad med pa'o/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci'i slad du bcom ldan
272a2(brgyad stong): 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad ma ma gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi zad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas tshad ma ma bstan to/ /kun dga' bo shes
272a3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas tshad ma ma brjod do/ /kun dga' bo dben pa'i chos la dben pa dmigs su med na de'i tshad ma lta ga la yod/ kun dga' bo de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gzhal du
272a4(brgyad stong): med pa'i phyir tshad ma med cing tshad med pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
272a5(brgyad stong): pa 'di nyid kyis rab du phye ba yin yang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zad pa 'am yongs su zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
272a6(brgyad stong): p a'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu 'byed par 'gyur yang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zad pa 'am yongs su zad par 'gyur
272a7(brgyad stong): pa ma yin no/ /kun dga' bo da ltar gzhal du med grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang kun
272a8(brgyad stong): dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin yang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zad pa 'am yongs su zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /kun dga' bo da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa

272b2(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zad par bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' zad par bya bar sems te/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
272b3(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni mi zad pa'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gnas 'di ni zab mo zhig yin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis gnas 'di zhu'o snyam mo/ /
272b4(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi bas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
272b5(brgyad stong): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mi zad pa ste 'di lta ste nam mkha' mi zad pa'i phyir chos thams cad skye ba med pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

272b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa zad pa med pa nyid kyis

273a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma rig pa mi zad pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du byed mi zad pa
273a2(brgyad stong): d ang rnam par shes pa mi zad pa dang ming dang gzugs mi zad pa dang skye mched drug mi zad pa dang rig pa mi zad pa dang tshor ba mi zad pa dang sred pa mi zad pa dang len pa mi zad pa dang srid pa mi zad pa dang skye ba mi zad pa dang rga shi mi zad pa dang

273b1(brgyad stong): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya ci ltar mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pas shes rab kyi pha

273b7(brgyad stong): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /chos gang yang rtag pa 'am brtan pa 'am ther zug pa 'am rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /chos gang yang byed pa po 'am tshor ba bor yang dag par rjes
273b8(brgyad stong): su mi mthong ngo / /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi zad par mngon par bsgrub pas mngon par sgrub cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing rten cing
274a1(brgyad stong): 'brel par 'byung pa la rnam par lta ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pas mngon par sgrub pa rten cing
274a2(brgyad stong): 'brel bar 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba de'i tshe rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin 'du shes ma yin 'du byed rnams ma yin rnam par shes pa yang
274a3(brgyad stong): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ma rig pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du 'du byed rnams ma yin rnam par shes pa ma yin ming dang gzugs ma yin skye mched drug ma yin reg pa ma yin tshor ba ma yin sred pa
274a4(brgyad stong): ma yin len pa ma yin srid pa yin skye ba ma yin rga shi ma yin mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'o zhes yang yang dag par
274a5(brgyad stong): r jes su mi mthong sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan yin no zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong chos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'am gzhan no zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
274a6(brgyad stong): ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe
274a7(brgyad stong): bdud sdig can shin du mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na mi zhig pha ma 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na shin du mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems
274a8(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe bdud sdig can yang shin du mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci bdud sdig can gcig cig shin du mya
274b1(brgyad stong): n gan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ram 'on te bdud sdig can mang po shin du mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ram 'on te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig can ci snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad
274b2(brgyad stong): kyang de'i tshe shin du mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
274b3(brgyad stong): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnas pas gnas pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad shin du mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rang rang gi stan la
274b4(brgyad stong): yang nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pas gnas pa la ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bdag cag
274b5(brgyad stong): gis 'di bzung la mtho brtsam mo snyam pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar bzlog par bya'o/ /snyam pa'i glags rnyed par mi 'gyur gting rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub
274b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
274b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang
274b8(brgyad stong): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni pha
275a1(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thabs mkhas pa thams cad bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

275b1(brgyad stong): g i bye ma snyed du sbyin pa byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa can de bas ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis nyi ma gcig 'das kyi bar la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di chung

279b3(brgyad stong): cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa rnyed dka' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las rjes su rig pa'i le'u

279b5(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs mi zad par sgrogs pa'i drung du na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom
279b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de tshol ba na ci ltar yongs su btsal lags/
279b7(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu sngon shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su tshol ba na
279b8(brgyad stong): lus la cher cher mi byed srog la mi lta rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa dag la mi gnas par yongs su btsal bas yongs su btsal to/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa
280a1(brgyad stong): zhig du phyin pa na bar snang las/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song zhig dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyis/ ci ltar lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang gnyid dang rmugs pa
280a2(brgyad stong): y id la byed pa mi skyed pa dang bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang tsha ba yid la byed pa

280a7(brgyad stong): smras pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de la 'di skad ces de bzhin du bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni sems can thams cad la snang bar byed 'dod pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir
280a8(brgyad stong): ro zhes smras so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu legs so legs so zhes smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
280b1(brgyad stong): po rtag tu ngus yang sgra thos te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par chos thams cad la mos pa bskyed la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis mtshan
280b2(brgyad stong): ma yongs su spang ba dang dngos po yongs su spang ba dang sems can du lta ba yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang chos thams cad stong

284a8(brgyad stong): du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su btsal gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma bcad par bskyed pas song shig dang / ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes
284b1(brgyad stong): gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs/ rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis
284b2(brgyad stong): phog na yid la byed pa gzhan mi skyed kyi/ gang bdag zug rngu 'di sgrol cing bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
284b3(brgyad stong): d pa' chen po rtag tu ngus yang de'i tshe gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de thos par byed cing chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong snyam sems
284b4(brgyad stong): pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus phyogs de nyid du 'dug pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de shes rab
284b5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston pa thos so/ /thos nas kyang chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
284b6(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa
284b7(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i
284b8(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par bsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
285a1(brgyad stong): dang / me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po mi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang
285a2(brgyad stong): ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems
285a3(brgyad stong): can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dang tshig dang yig 'bru sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rang bzhin gyis
285a4(brgyad stong): tha snyad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming dang nges pa'i tshig dang yig 'bru
285a5(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya
285a6(brgyad stong): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
285a7(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes
285a8(brgyad stong): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge mngon par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul
285b1(brgyad stong): dang rnam par bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po thams
285b2(brgyad stong): cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
285b3(brgyad stong): thams cad la nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
285b4(brgyad stong): cad bye brag med par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur pa'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma
285b5(brgyad stong): dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
285b6(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma
285b7(brgyad stong): chags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
285b8(brgyad stong): te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhal du med grangs med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
286a1(brgyad stong): nyid rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu nged kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa
286a2(brgyad stong): na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bzhin du yongs su btsal te/ yongs su tshol ba na yang gang 'dir khyod kyis thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu nyid dag thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rtogs par
286a3(brgyad stong): khong du chud par gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to/ /nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas na/ gang mnyam par bzhag par bya ba 'am ldang bar bya ba 'am/ gang byang chub tu spyad
286a4(brgyad stong): par bya ba 'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yin te chos gang
286a5(brgyad stong): gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas/ nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu dang 'od 'dom gang
286a6(brgyad stong): ba dang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin pa rjes su thob ste/ yon tan

286a8(brgyad stong): du gnyer ba dang 'dod pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don du gnyer ba dang 'dod pa la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen

288a4(brgyad stong): khye'u 'di la lus btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod par bya'o/ /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya'o/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems
288a5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang yang btsongs te/ rigs kyi bu de la bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rigs
288a6(brgyad stong): sam/ yon tan gyi khyad par ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des bu mo de la 'di skad ces bu mo rigs kyi bu de ni gang la ngas bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te/
288a7(brgyad stong): de la ngas bslabs na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/ lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu yang thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu
288a8(brgyad stong): chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu dang 'od 'dom gang ba dang 'od zer mtha' yas pa dang byams pa chen po dang snying rjes chen po dang dga' ba chen po dang btang snyoms chen po dang mi 'jigs
288b1(brgyad stong): pa bzhi rab tu thob par 'gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / tshul khrims
288b2(brgyad stong): rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rab tu thob par 'gyur/ bla
288b3(brgyad stong): na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang gis sems can thams cad la kun du bgo bsha' bya ba'i bla na med pa'i chos rin po che yang rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ /
288b4(brgyad stong): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po phul du byung ba 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni ngo mtshar te/ rigs kyi bu chos
288b5(brgyad stong): kyi don 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongs su gtang bar bya ba yin na mang po'i phyir lta ci smos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya che zhing phul du byung ba yongs su brjod pa ci lta
288b6(brgyad stong): bar bdag kyang 'dod cing bzod do/ /de lta na yang rigs kyi bu khyod gang dang gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i gser ram/ nor bu 'am mu tig gam bai dUr+ya
288b7(brgyad stong): ' am dngul lam mu sa ra gar pa 'am lo hi tA ra ka 'am shel lam me tog gam bdug pa 'am dri 'am phreng ba 'am byug pa 'am phye ma 'am gos sam gdugs sam rgyal mtshan nam dril bu 'am ba dan nam mar me khyod la ci
288b8(brgyad stong): dgos pa de dang de khyod la sbyin gyis bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig / bdag kyang khyed dang 'grogs te 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong la/ bdag kyang khyod
289a1(brgyad stong): dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o zhes smras so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas/ bdag
289a2(brgyad stong): nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod de lta bu'i yi dam la brtan pa dang / de lta bu'i chos don du gnyer ba 'di ni legs so legs so/ /sngon gyi de bzhin
289a3(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa yongs su zhus pas chos rin po che shin du thob nas bla na med
289a4(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rigs kyi bu nga la snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang gis bya ba med kyi/ nga khyod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mchog slongs shig /
289a5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu khyod la mchog ci lta bu zhig sbyin par bya zhes smras so/ /des de la smras pa/ brgya byin sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag la stsol cig /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yul 'di la ni nga'i nus pa yod pa ma yin te/
289a6(brgyad stong): yang yul 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyis/ mchog gzhan slongs shig /rtag tu ngus smras pa/ bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas 'di la ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin khyod brtson pa chung bar
289a7(brgyad stong): gyis shig / lha'i dbang po nga'i lus 'di la bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po bden pa gang gis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
289a8(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan cing / bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo med par mkhyen na/ bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon gyi ci lta ba bzhin du gyur cig ces byas pa dang /
289b1(brgyad stong): de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyi ci lta ba bzhin du gnas pa dang / nad med pa dang gnod
289b2(brgyad stong): pa med par gyur to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / bdud sdig can yang spobs pa med par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la lan glan par spobs pa ma skyes nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur
289b3(brgyad stong): to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog /bdag gi khyim gang na yod pa der 'dong ngo / /bdag gis pha ma'i drung nas nor
289b4(brgyad stong): blangs te/ 'di lta ste chos 'dod pa'i phyir gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang mchod par bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur stir bya ba khyod la sbyin no/ /de nas
289b5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang 'grogs nas/ de'i rang gi khyim gang na yod pa der dong ste phyin nas sgo drung du bsdad do/ /de nas tshong dpon kyi bu mo de rang gi khyim du phyin nas pha ma la 'di
289b6(brgyad stong): skad ces smras so/ /yab yum gser dang dngul dang rin po che dang nor bu dang gos dang me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang chos gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dang rol mo'i yo byad
289b7(brgyad stong): sna tshogs dag bdag la stsol cig / bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal ba'i g.yog mo bu mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag cag 'grogs te/ byang chub
289b8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /de yang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur zhing des bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
290a1(brgyad stong): bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu zhes bya ba de su zhig de da lta gang na 'dug /bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de da lta 'o skol gyi sgo
290a2(brgyad stong): drung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug
290a3(brgyad stong): bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal bas de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongs la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
290a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyo ba 'ga' yang ma rnyed cing ma rnyed pas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas mi dga' bar sems shing mchi ma phyung nas mchis pa dang / lha
290a5(brgyad stong): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur bas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde bas mi dga' bar sems shing mchi ma phyung nas gnas pa ci nyes/ des de la smras pa/
290a6(brgyad stong): bdag nyid 'tshong bar 'dod na bdag gi de nyo ba yang ma rnyed do/ /bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyi brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang / rtag tu ngus smras pa/ shes
290a7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod par bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur sti bya'o/ /nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de la rag las pas 'di lta ste/ chos
290a8(brgyad stong): 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bgyis pa dang / bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyi brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ni nga mi 'dod de/ 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa der mi'i snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang dag dgos so zhes bgyis
290b1(brgyad stong): pa dang / rigs kyi bu des yi ma bsad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no zhes smras nas/ de mtshon rnon po thogs te bdag gi lag pa phug nas khrag gzags/ brla sha med par btogs te rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song nas phyogs gcig
290b2(brgyad stong): tu 'dug ste/ rus pa dang rkang sbyin no snyam nas rigs kyi bu de khrag gzags pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do/ /mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/
290b3(brgyad stong): de'i thad du bdag mchis nas 'di skad du bgyis so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid kyis lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad ces mchi ste/ bu mo bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang snying
290b4(brgyad stong): dang rus pa dang rkang sbyin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni dbul te nga la nor gzhan ci yang med do zhes mchi'o/ /bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab
290b5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod par bya ro/ /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur stir bya'o zhes mchi nas/ bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis te rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tan
290b6(brgyad stong): gyi rigs sam yon tan gyi khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal byar med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta bu'i
290b7(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag la mchi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas/ bdag kyang dga' ba dang rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas 'di snyam du bgyid de/
290b8(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'di shin du chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'di lta bur gang rang gi lus kyi bar du yang mi gnas par spro ba ni dka' ba bgyid pa ste ngo mtshar to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na/ bdag cag la longs spyod
291a1(brgyad stong): gang dag mang zhing rgya che bdag yod na/ ci'i phyir bdag cag chos la mchod pa mi bgyid/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir mi gdab snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so/ /

291a7(brgyad stong): par du 'phags pa sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa'i bar ni ngo mtshar to/ /rigs kyi bu gang dag de dag gi phyir de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas dag la spro bar byed na khyod nged kyis gnang gis/ bu mo nged kyang khyod dang lhan
291a8(brgyad stong): cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang mchod pa byed du 'gro yis nged 'gro ba'i go skabs phye shig / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa'
291b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod par bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba'i phyir chas te rang gi pha ma la rig par byas nas 'di skad ces/ yab yum ci skad gsungs pa de bzhin du mdzod cig dang bdag ni dge ba'i phyogs
291b2(brgyad stong): gang gi yang bar chad mi bgyid do zhes smras nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa dang bkur stir bya ba'i phyir chas par gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing
291b3(brgyad stong): rta lnga brgya yang rgyan gyis brgyan/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to/ /rgyan gyis brgyan nas me tog tha dad pa kha dog sna tshogs pa dag dang gos kha dog sna tshogs thogs/ bdug pa dang di dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang
291b4(brgyad stong): phye ma dang chos gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang bdan dag thogs/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag dang rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i rang bzhin gyi me tog dag kyang thogs/ bza' ba dang bca' ba dang
291b5(brgyad stong): myang ba mang po pha mas kyang thogs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang shing rta gcig tu lhan cig tu zhugs te/ bu mo lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du
291b6(brgyad stong): bdar nas pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang shar phyogs ga la ba der logs su dong ste mthar gyis song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus rgyang ring mo zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna
291b7(brgyad stong): bdun rnam par bkra ba blta na sngug pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi ra ba rim bdun gyis bskor ba/ rta babs bdun yod pa/ 'obs rim bdun par ta la'i phreng ba rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du
291b8(brgyad stong): dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor cing rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa mi dang skye bo mang pos gang pa/ bar gyi tshong khang gi phreng ba ri mo sna tshogs su bris pa lta bu blta na sdug pa phigs par gyur pa mnyam
292a1(brgyad stong): zhing mtshungs pa/ skye bo dang khyogs kyi bzhon pa dang rkang gis 'gro ba'i gnas 'dzer dog med par gnas pa lnga brgya dag gis legs par bsgrubs pa/ grong khyer de'i dbus kyi bzhi mdo na byang chub sems dpa' sems
292a2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang 'khor stong phrag du ma dang 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas chos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de 'di lta bu'i
292a3(brgyad stong): bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no/ /de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
292a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni bdag gi ma chi'o snyam nas shing rta las babs so/ /de nas shing rta de las babs pa dang gzhan tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang mnyam du shing rta las babs so/ /
292a5(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te mchod pa'i bkod pa tshad med pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
292a6(brgyad stong): chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo / /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin las byas pa
292a7(brgyad stong): tsan dan dmar pos brgyan cing mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i gru bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te de dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed do/ /bdug spos kyi snod dngul
292a8(brgyad stong): las byas pa bzhi yang phyogs bzhir btags te 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir a ga ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis bdug par byed do/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna
292b1(brgyad stong): b dun las byas pa'i khri bzhi btsugs te de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag nas de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bai dUr+ya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste khang pa brtsegs pa de yang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs
292b2(brgyad stong): rnam pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang pa brtsegs pa de mchod pa'i bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan pa mthong zhing de na lha stong phrag du
292b3(brgyad stong): ma dag kyang mthong ste/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang lha'i dngul gyi phye ma dag gis/ khang pa brtsegs pa de la 'thor mngon par 'thor mngon par rab tu 'thor bar mthong
292b4(brgyad stong): ngo lha'i sil snyan dag kyang thos so/ mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i dbang po khyod lha stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig rin po che'i khang pa
292b5(brgyad stong): b rtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang lha'i dngul gyi phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing mngon par 'thor mngon par rab tu 'thor lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams bar snang la ci'i phyir
292b6(brgyad stong): rdung / de skad ces smras pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
292b7(brgyad stong): chin po rnams kyi yum dang yongs su 'dren pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang

302b6(brgyad stong): cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po skyes par gyur to/ /chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
302b7(brgyad stong): rlom pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu med pa zhes
302b8(brgyad stong): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
303a1(brgyad stong): dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
303a2(brgyad stong): gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu med pa
303a3(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
303a4(brgyad stong): dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / /chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
303a5(brgyad stong): thams cad dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
303a6(brgyad stong): chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de lta bu la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug cu
303a7(brgyad stong): rab tu thob par gyur to/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // rab 'byor byang
303a8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu/ shar phyogs dang lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang mtshams dang 'og
303b1(brgyad stong): dang steng gi phyogs dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye
303b2(brgyad stong): m a snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas te tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang ming 'di nyid dang yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha
303b3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo / /'di lta ste dper na/ da ltar nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor
303b4(brgyad stong): cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gyis mdun du byas te tshul 'di nyid dang ming 'di nyid dang yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no/ /de mang du thos pa
303b5(brgyad stong): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang thos pa rgya mtsho dang ldan par gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams cad du yang nam yang sangs rgyas dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /skye ba thams cad du yang gang dang gang
303b6(brgyad stong): du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu skyes te/ tha na rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ nges mi khom pa thams
303b7(brgyad stong): cad ni spangs dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni bsgrubs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang
303b8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
304a1(brgyad stong): thob par 'dod pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya gzung bar bya bcad par bya klag par bya kun chub par bya rab tu gdon par bya bstan
304a2(brgyad stong): par bya nye bar bstan par bya lung dpog par bya kha ton du bya bri bar bya de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gsal pa legs par bris te/ me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang / phreng
304a3(brgyad stong): ba dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang bdan dang kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang mchod pa rnam pa mang pos/ bkur stir bya bla mar bya rjed par bya mchod par bya ri mor bya bsnyen bkur bya
304a4(brgyad stong): ste kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems de bzhin
304a5(brgyad stong): gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
304a6(brgyad stong): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang ngag gi las byams pa
304a7(brgyad stong): p a yid du 'ong ba dang yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim gror byas te de lta bas na kun dga' bo da ltar nga bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la ci ltar khyod kyis dga' ba dang dang ba dang dad pa dang ri mor byas pa kun dga'
304a8(brgyad stong): bo de ltar nga 'das nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang byos shig / kun dga' bo ci nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar kun dga' bo khyod
304b1(brgyad stong): la lan gnyis lan gsum du yongs su gtad do rjes su yongs su gtad do/ /kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na ci srid du rab tu spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga'
304b2(brgyad stong): bo de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu gdon pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston
304b3(brgyad stong): pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang yi ger 'dri ba dang / me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang mchod
304b4(brgyad stong): pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma bral
304b5(brgyad stong): bar rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
304b6(brgyad stong): po byams pa la sogs pa dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/
304b7(brgyad stong): /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //
304b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa rdzogs so// //bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba las/ paN Di ta dI pa~M` ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / /
305a1(brgyad stong): lo ts+tsha ba 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan phab pa las/ slad kyis lo ts+tsha ba chen po rngog blo ldan shes rab kyis legs par bcos shing gtan la phab pa// //
